body: This app has made it so much easier to keep track of my blood sugar. Convenient - I can take it everywhere I go and enter blood sugar when ever (app even organizes my numbers.) And the graphs give me a clear picture of my blood sugar trends. Thanks for improving my self care monitoring.

title: Good App - could be better
body: Don't like having to add my meds each time I make a log entry. Should only have to enter the name once and then just enter the dosages. Also, when you are entering a glucose reading, say before bed, and then want to enter a med, it goes back to the first description.  With a few minor changes it could be very good.

title: Need iPad app
body: I have used this for a considerable time.  I also have an iPad and think it would be even better if they had if for the iPad and the ability to keep them both in sync.  It sync's great with the internet so I'm sure it could work for an iPad as well.

title: Works for me!
body: I'm a type one diabetic have been for 16 years this app has help me to monitor my blood glucose along with the food intake and insulin intake also my other medications can be put into this app helps me whenever not around to be able to write something down on paper and pencil.

title: Works great for me
body: I've tried several other logs and keep coming back to Glucose Buddy. It does sync by my iphone to the computer. That really was a plus so I did not have to enter 94 entries from my phone to the web based site. I really cannot find a negative at this time.

title: Paying Attention to Details
body: These guys are doing these things right:

title: Glucose Buddy
body: Type 1 diabetic.  I love this app!  I use it every day to track my blood sugar readings and meds.  Data input couldn't be simpler.  I store all the logs on my iPhone; then, when my doctor wants to see my readings, all I have to do is hand him my phone and they are all there in both text and graph form.

title: Glucose Buddy gets it right!
body: Recently diagnosed Type2. After doing extensive research to find the perfect  App to help me "stay on top" of my blood glucose numbers I find Glucose Buddy the best! Informative, easy, and innovative. Can't wait to see what they come up with in the way of 'add-ond'. Would most definately recommend GB! It works for my busy lifestyle.

title: Love the features!
body: Works well. I wish it would sync both ways. I have replaced my cell a couple times and lost historical graphing/logs. I have to browse in Safari to see the older data. Instead of showing the doc my phone, I have to take the laptop.

title: Glucose buddy
body: Great app Really makes it easy to keep track of numbers on daily basis no more paper or forgetting to write it down. Easy-to-use And keeps track of results so I don't forget and I can see where I have been and where I am headed in my results Best thing since sliced bread

title: iHealthy!
body: Since I started treating my diabetes with responsibility, I have developed a good and trusting relationship with my Doctor.

title: I use this app several times a day.
body: Have had type 1 diabetes for over 10 years and have been using this app for the past 2 years. Very easy to use. Doctor loves it and I never forget to bring my logs with me since they're on my phone.

title: Great App...... But
body: I have to see my medication nurse every three months. She really likes the e-mailed readings. I have to delete the previous three months to start fresh. What a pain to delete each reading one at a time. THERE SHOULD BE A WAY T O DELETE A DATE RANGE. Work on it guys. I find it easier to delete the app and reinstall. Much quicker even if I have to redo my account info.

title: Great tracking tool!
body: I just needed a simple app for tracking glucose levels and this is very easy to use. The graphing features are great! The only recommendation I have is that I would like to sync both ways so I can have all my recent data on my devices.

title: Pretty good basis, could use some tweaks.
body: Overall, this is a pretty good and useful app. It has a lot of good features and covers pretty much every thing one needs.

title: Awesome app
body: Gotta say as a 20 year old, always on the go, type 1 diabetic just using this app for a week has improved my quality of life! Push reminders to check my sugars are a god send!!!!!! Currently using an insulin pump so combine this log book with a CGMS I'm hopefully getting and it'll be a god send!!

title: Great free app
body: I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes and have to test 4 times a day. This app is great for keeping up with my numbers. I like that I can add notes of what I ate with each entry to keep track of food triggers.  Also, my doc loves how easy it is to review my numbers at a glance.  The graph is a nice overview, too. No complaints here!

title: Sometimes won't synch
body: Overall, this works as advertised. Sometimes it won't sync with my online account. That's on my home WiFi, so I don't know why. The calorie tracking app synch is not free (one-time fee), and I didn't pay for it because that app kept crashing. I like being able to email my log to myself.

title: Awesome app!
body: I don't have diabetes but my dog does, and I could not keep track of his food, exercise, insulin, and glucose curves without this app! When I take him to the vet I go online and print out his charts and logs, and he has all of the information. It's a perfect app and always works. It's never crashed.

title: Glucose buddy is my buddy
body: This program is fantastic.  Since my doctor has "ordered" me to keep records this is easy and does the job.  The app on my ipad and the iPhone while combined on the go and desktop at home is the way to go.  Keep up good work.  And keep it as easy as it is now.

title: Great app; just what I needed.
body: Glucose Buddy let me banish the paper logbooks. I can track my BG and insulin very easily. Being able to download the data from the website is a huge benefit, as is being able to email from within the app. Give it a try; you won't regret it.

title: Great
body: Love this program. Managing my sons type two diabetes.

title: Feesback
body: My attraction to it was that it provided a date/time stamp to log all items but it keyed on the blood readings instead of the date/time. To use it, I use the notes to identify either blood readings or insulin. I would gladly offer my services to develop a set of requirements to best suit my needs.

title: Great App!!!
body: I love using this app. It fits my lifestyle better than a paper log. I don't have to worry about losing it. I like the fact that you can print out the logs and show them to your healthcare provider. I'm really thankful that they provide this service for free. Keep up the good work!

title: Easy to use
body: So far I have been very pleased with how easy GB is to use

title: SUPERIOR APPLICATION
body: For those of you who have decided to take control over diabetes YOU MUST USE THIS app. The application is simple to use and takes no time at all to use. Track all of your high and low trends so that you can begin to to plan what and what not to do. TO GET THE FULL BENEFIT sign up and use the free web site!

title: If your serious get this! It's worth it!
body: I keep track of my blood sugar results everyday. It allows me to view my results on a graph to see where I need to adjust my diet. If your serious about getting your blood sugar under control get this app. Highly recommend this app.

title: Must App
body: I became pre diabetic this year. I started watching the numbers and manually writing them down. I discovered this app through a friend and I have been using it since. I love the graph and the averages it puts out. I am a visual learner and these two things really motivates me to do better every day!

title: Makes life easy...
body: If you are a techno geek like me and carry your technology with you everywhere, it makes life easy to always be able to record results. I hated walking around with a pen and logbook. I just email my results to the doc and he easily has my results.

title: Love this app
body: I have been using this App for just over a year when I was newly diagnosed with type 2. It's been very handy and my dr even approved. Whenever I go to my appts I just show her my entries on my phone.  I've also printed them out to go in my medical records. I highly recommend this app!

title: Better at record keeping
body: I used to carry a notebook in my bag until my friend introduced me to this app. So much more efficient.  I can actually keep track  & monitor my blood sugar levels & make the needed decision on how to lower or increase my sugar levels by food or exercise. Love it!

title: An aid to a new diabetic
body: Awesome app!!! I use it multiple times per day and it helps me learn to control my blood sugar.  It is an excellent way to share my blood sugar levels with my doctor. Thank you for creating this app! My only wish is for the ability to merge this app with a food diary.

title: Having fun logging my blood
body: So far this app has been great beats writing everything by hand and I can easily track and see where I need to improve.  My doctor will be please that she no longer needs to guess what I wrote down by hand anymore.

title: Simple, Easy & Convenient
body: Logs my levels quickly and easily and allow me a great way to share with my doctor. I was just diagnosed at the beginning of this month and this app helps make my life easy as I make major adjustments. Highly recommended!

title: Better than most
body: It is better than the other glucose logging apps I could find, but it has problems.  The screen is too crowded. Even on a 6s+ you have to scroll to add more than one medication. The time of day tags don't carry over from tab to tab. You have to enter the amount of medicine (I.e. 20mg) each time, there is no way of setting a default.

title: Engineer
body: GB is an excellent tool to keep track of your blood sugar levels. I use it daily and print the data and graph to provide to my doctor. After 2 months of use, I can see a definite improvement in my eating habits. I have tried the 'integrated' calorie counter, feel that it needs some work. Bottom line - GB is a great app!

title: Very Helpful
body: Since my Gestational Diabetes diagnosis, I've found it to be very helpful to keep track of my numbers.

title: Glucose buddy is great
body: I've been using this app for a couple of years now and it is great for keeping track of my blood sugars. It's easy to use and understand. And it allows me to share this information with my doctor so that we can effectively manage my diabetes.

title: Outstanding!
body: I was looking for something like a spreadsheet to keep track of my blood sugar in preparation for making the pus to get a pump... Well, I found this miracle app wit so much more! I love the blogs, the ease of data entry and the averages that it provides at a glance. I wish I'd had this on my "palm pilot" 10 years ago!

title: Convenient for glucose levels
body: Pros: This app is great for keeping track of glucose levels. It's easy to use and has all the essential options for info needed, and I haven't had trouble with the app crashing.

title: Great app
body: This app has allowed me to track my bgl during gestational diabetes.  It is easy for my doctor to read and simple for me to use. I like that it links online as well. I have not used anything in it except the logs for tracking bgl so I can't speak for the rest of the app

title: Does It's Job Well!
body: The app foes what it's supposed to do. It replaces my old log book and I always have the app on me so I can check A1c, dietary measures, etc all in one, easily searchable place!

title: Very Helpful and Easy!
body: I've used Glucose Buddy for almost a year now and it makes tracking and managing my Diabetes extremely easy! I especially love the ability to sync my logs to the website so all I have to do is pull it up and print it for my doctor visits! Great app!

title: Easy to use
body: I have been using Glucose Buddy for approximately six weeks. It is extremely easy to use and logically set up. I love that I can test anywhere and not be concerned about remembering to log my reading on paper.  It is also useful for emailing the log to my physician.

title: Love it.
body: Been using this app for a while now. I usually keep my b/s in a notebook and then just get tired of writing them down or just forget to. Sense I pretty much have my phone with me 24/7 I don't forget. I also started writing them down again.

title: Ugly but useful
body: This app needs a cosmetic makeover to earn 5 stars --the icon and splash screen are absolutely terrible.

title: Great app!!!!!'
body: I am a type 1 and have been using this app for five months . Bottom line it has helped lower my a1c.

title: Wonderful application
body: This program is great! Just by tracking my food, activities, etc. I've been able to drop my average glucose level from 119 to 100.8 over a 90 day period. I had a question for support and they responded in a very timely manner.

title: Don't get the update!
body: I purchased the premium add on for this app ages ago, and the reason was to support the developer, not because I needed or wanted the add on.  I updated today, I have ads added to this app, and there is no way to remove them, event though I'm a premium customer.  I'm extremely unhappy about this. it dropped my rating of this app from 5 to 2 stars, and I'm off to find a different Glucose logger, unless the ads disappear really soon.

title: Very Useful
body: This app does just what is needed to manage a disease that requires accurate record keeping. I use it daily and rely on the summaries to keep my physician up on my progress. The updates are very much appreciated, since i've used this app for many of the 16+ years with this diagnosis.

title: Great!!
body: I would give this five stars but for the week I've been using it I have failed to connect to the server on two different days due to server issues.  I am currently pre-diab so I'm only checking once a day. If I was doing this more often and needing to track more info I would  definitely pay for the add ons.

title: Great app!
body: I use this app daily, so much better than my daily log book.  I can almost predict what my A1c will be by my numbers.  I love that it syncs with the website, so data is always safe. Tracking carbs and activity as well can help me see what is affecting my numbers. Great job GB!

title: Review-O.k.
body: It's alright for the most part. I like how I can see my blood sugars over the past time and it provides me with a clear and easy graph to show my Doctors, but it logs my account out a lot of the time and then proceeds to tell me I don't have one, so I'm constantly having to make a new one and I lose all my data with my old ones, which is a problem and a pain for my Doctors.

title: Love it
body: Have to monitor for gestational. Love the fact the app is so easy to use and keep up with everything especially while I am at work. I also like that it has different settings to show if you're type 1/2 or gestational.

title: Easy to use and helpful to track blood sugar levels
body: This app is easy to use and helpful with tracking my levels and then easily being able to show them to my doctor. The only thing it doesn't do that I wish it did was send me alerts to test.

title: Love App But NO Intragration
body: Downloaded App 2wks ago, love it. Does all I want it too. Only problem is  integrating w/CalorieTracker!! CalorieTracker CONSTANTLY CRASHES & isn't worth its services. Rite now I wouldn't recommend this Add-In. I'm surprised no one else has complained bout this problem. CalorieTracker's reviews really reflect this problem. Otherwise I highly recommend this Apps usage!!

title: Glucose Buddy
body: This application has allowed me to manage diabetes more efficiently in my busy life. Before I started using this app I did not know where I stood or what was happening inside my body. I now have a better understanding of how my body reacts to my caloric intake and medicine. I gave it 4 stars because I have not yet signed up for all functions yet.

title: Great app to help monitor blood glucose!
body: I really like this app I just wish I could email my Dr my logs directly from my iPhone. Also it would be great to change the log sort feature/style. Over all I would definitely recommend this app for diabetics.

title: Love this app
body: I have been pre-diabetic and during my pregnancy I know have diabetes. Been using this app to send my blood sugars to my doctors office and I love it. So much easier than hand writing all my readings and faxing it in. Wish there was a way to record carbs eaten at each meal though.

title: Great for keeping a newbie on track
body: I just found out I was type two in April. The app has made it easy to keep me honest and in track. I would have given it 5 stars but the program calorie tracker that they push for a fee doesn't work and always crashes.

title: Awesome app!!!
body: This app has been very useful tome. It encourages me towards maintaining good blood glucose (BG) levels as well as maintaining a healthy lifestyle.  There is even a support group Forum where you can ask questions, receive answers & share your experience(s) with other diabetics. Best price too!!  üòÉ

title: Poor support or activation fix
body: I have been struggling trying to activate my account. I've sent in a coupe emails and spent a few hours trying to work through this. Very dissatisfied with app. It is useless without being able to send your blood sugars to your doctor. I have gotten NO response from support. Very dissatisfied! I even have the Pro version but neither activates! Thought this would be simple to fix. However, without contact from support, fix won't happen.

title: Inconsistency / Inability to Sync
body: It's almost as if the person responsible for the server is not awake when I am going to test my blood. I never seem to be able to sync with the server for hours or even days after I have logged my results. I've yet to try downloading and/or printing off my results to take to my doctor but I will keep you posted!

title: Best FREE app ever!
body: Love that this app doesn't limit your input like some other free apps cap off how many log entries you can make. Gave it only 4 stars because weight should be included & although you can enter food, the app doesn't log the nutrition like some others do... Just carbs (that you have to manually enter)!

title: Great help
body: This app has helped me to take my blood sugar readings more often. It is so easy to keep track and the graph is nice to see an overall look at how I am doing. I also like the email link. I am able to just email my readings directly to my Doctors office. I would definitely suggest this to others.

title: Bring back the graphs
body: I use this app daily. The reason I keep it over other glucose-monitoring apps was the graph which quickly could show me and my doctor whether my fasting glucose was in the controlled range. I unfortunately have to add to the chorus of other reviews that I will likely switch to another app unless the graphing ability is added back to the program. My physician was considering telling other diabetics about this app solely for the graphing capabilities. Please bring back the graphs.

title: The Everyday 5 star app
body: Every day, 3 to 5 times a day I test and then I enter my BG #s in here, my weight in here, at every meal my Carbs in here ... everything goes in here & everything syncs with my PC and there I print out graphs for my doctor.  Works great, crashes are extremely rare ... it's the best I've found.

title: Does the job
body: I use this app to record my gl while I'm dealing with gestational diabetes. The food chart doesn't save so I put my food in the notes section of my test results. The program tends to freeze up on occasion or kicks me out of the program which is annoying but overall it does what I need it to do and I love that it syncs to the net and that I can print off the spreadsheet.

title: Very helpful tool!
body: I have not been using Glucose Buddy for very long, but I use it all the time now.  I have been recently diagnosed with Type I Diabetes and it is very helpful to have one place to keep track of everything: blood sugar testing, medications, and food.  Thank you!

title: Easy
body: I just use the basic features and this little app works great for me. After 5 months of low carb eating, I showed my Doc my sugar numbers stored in this app on my phone. Not only did he like tha app, but he liked my readings enough to take me off me medication!

title: Very useful apps...!!!
body: I am very happy having this apps. I have been using it for almost 2 years, I every day to keep my glucose records updated. My life is easier since I found it, especially for the graph and the web link features.

title: Great for keeping track
body: As a newly diagnosed diabetic, I find this app perfect for helping me keep track of everything in one place.  I especially like that it syncs to my Mac so that when I am online 8 can access the info w/ out having to pull out my iPad.

title: Great glucose monitoring app, could be even better
body: I really like this app. It is well thought out and easy to use. One thing that would make it better would be if you could set an alarm to remind you to test your blood sugar after eating. Thanks to the devs for making my life easier!

title: Love it!!!!
body: Have it on my pc, tablet, and iPhone so no matter when or where I'm able to update and keep track. Hoping the sync option for the tablet will come soon so I can sync all 3 together to keep them all the same. :)

title: Great App
body: I really like the design of this app. Not sure about the online syncing. I want to be reassured about security of medical records. Would rather it sync to Dropbox or something or the like. Also, you can move icons around but the go back after you exit the app.  Needs to be permanent if I customize it.

title: Great helper!
body: I was never so keen about keeping up with logs until I found this app. The ability to graph within the app and take snapshots impresses my med team - but not as much as being able to log into an online system and get a more comprehensive report. That sort of upgrade is on my wish list.

title: Extremely Helpful
body: This app is essential, especially for a Mac user, since most of the desktop applications for linking a glucose monitor with a computer are for PC only. The log-in feature allows me to show my doctor my day to day struggles and victories.

title: Need A Real iPad Version
body: iPhone application is very handy. Graphing and layout of emailed logs could be improved could be improved and export ability be added. Biggest complaint is not having an app designed for the iPad which took advantage of the larger screen. I wasted $13 buying the sync app because of the lack of a real iPad app. $13 a year to sync is excessive. Still a 3 star rating.

title: The best of the bunch
body: After running a copy of every glucose tracking app there was in the store this was the best one there is. The graphs online are exactly what my Dr. needs to see. No extra data to enter to see my data in the groupings I need.

title: Easy way to keep up!
body: All I need is a way to dump my new meter Verio IQ into this, and I need for nothing!  This ap is very friendly to use.  Once you do the legwork of entering all your meds and a month of food as you go; it all is as easy as a click every day!

title: Gets the job done
body: It's an ok app. Fairly straightforward to use, but is a bit slow to load data into and a bit annoying that you need to upload to their server to complete the tracking process (server is often not available). I can use it, but am trolling to see if there is something better.

title: Great so far, but computer site needs work
body: So far this app is working great. However using glucose buddy online on my computer is not so great. I am trying to enter my logs and it keeps locking up and I have to refresh and I lose data. Very frustrating. Hopefully this will be fixed.

title: Great way to keep track of GD!
body: It's so simple to keep track of my numbers with this app.  My doctor can look at them right on my phone.  It is so nice not having to haul around sheets of paper and a pen everywhere.  I know I always have my phone on hand!

title: Loss about 15 months of data
body: A few days ago, the app disappeared from my phone for some unknown reason. I was able to download the app again, but my log wasn't recovered. Otherwise, a higher rating would have been given. I email the log to myself weekly, but a few days of numbers were lost.

title: No longer supported
body: A great app. I've used it for years but it hasn't been updated or supported for a few years. I doesn't sync with Apple Health or other recent apps. And now I'm getting notices from Apple that it will not run on iOS 11 if it's not updated, so it will soon become useless. It's really too bad because it's so easy to use. Very frustrating that there doesn't appear to be anybody home in customer support or IT. If they update it, it would be 5 stars.

title: Can't email log entries
body: At first this handy app seemed flawless, but after adding over 100 log entries, it's lost the ability to email them. Unfortunately this has rendered all of my careful logging useless to my doctor. Oh well. I suppose this app is still helpful if you are not being carefully monitored by your doctor, but since I need to give my logs to my health care professional, I will need to look for another solution.

title: Doctor Approval
body: My new doctor remembers me as the one with the neat IPhone app on which I show him my logs and graphs. He wishes all his patients used it as he can quickly see my records and give me instructions on insulin dosage as we try to lower my Type II levels in two week intervals.

title: Awesome!!!!
body: Love it! I didnt mind testing but logging was a pain in the a##.

title: Love this app!!!
body: This app helps organize everything so perfectly , I brought it in to show the history to the endocrinologist and even he was amazed. He said were doing a great job and appreciated everything being organized so well. Thanks for a great app!!!

title: Great App!
body: This app gives you an easy and effective way to track blood glucose! It's a little pricey when you buy the premium services, but ultimately worth the convenience. The calorie tracker app crashes every time and isn't worth the effort!

title: Helps with keeping track and sending in #
body: This app is really helpful for me. This is my second bout with gestational diabetes and I am require to fax or call in my numbers weekly to my RN. This app allows me to email then in. Us the notes section helps me keep track of food so we can change my diet as needed.

title: Great App!!
body: I used to record my readings in a notebook and then on Saturdays, transfer that data  to a spreadsheet . This APP has replaced those manual methods and I'm able to immediately upload my data and print out reports/lists to share with my doctor.  I love it!

title: Great
body: I really enjoy this app! It makes noting my BG easier! It's easy to use & set up! I like being able to note when I took it, the time of day & any other info I need to note.  I highly recommend this app for any diabetics that test often.

title: Great overall
body: Great app that certainly helps show your sugars over time. Only reason it didn't get 5 stars is I wish you could look at sugars in a linear timeline not just highest lowest and average of the day. Would also be cool to be able to sort by type of sugar (ex: before lunch or out of bed etc). But it's great!

title: Great tool
body: I was recently diagnosed with type 2 diabetes and I looked for an app to help me track my levels. This app is great for managing your gl, food and much more. I downloaded several other apps, but this one does the most and is very easy to use.

title: Best of all monitoring apps I've seen
body: I've been using it for about a month and it works well.  Tech support is responsive and helpful.  I inquired about modifying the email function so it will send only a selected range of dates.  They say this is coming.

title: Used to be five stars...
body: Don't get me wrong, the update is nice, I've never had a problem with it crashing either. My complaint: they took the graphs away.  Give them back and this would be a five star rating. I use it daily, but like others have said, my Dr and I prefer to use the graph for tracking. I hope they get that 'fixed' ASAP!!!!

title: Glucose Buddy
body: I really enjoy using Glucose Buddy because it helps me stay accountable. I'm happy to have it on my phone because I have great difficulty keeping up with paper logs. Now I have it with me at all times.  I still need to learn how to use all of the features

title: Great
body: I have a family history of diabetes and this is one of the simplest ways to keep track of it. I have to watch my sugar because of hypoglycemia and even encouraged my grandmother to download it on her iPhone.. She loves the ease as well!! Highly recommend

title: Great tool
body: As a recently diagnosed person, this tool is helping me get into the habit of tracking my blood glucose levels.  I have not scratched the surface of its capability, but I use what I need today.  I'll get to the other capability later.  I'm pleased with the product.  Try it!

title: Lencrabb
body: I have had diabetes for over 15 years, and this has given me a terrific insight of the relationship of insulin and food intake and their effect on my blood sugar.  My doctor is thrilled with the charts I give him when i visit him.

title: Awesome App
body: This is the best app I have. I was just diagnosed with diabetes and this helps me keep track of what is working and what isn't. So easy to get the logs to show and impress my doctor. A must have for any diabetic. My doctor is very happy to have this organized neat information.

title: Glucose buddy
body: This app is amazing before finding this app I had not controlled my blood sugars very well and once I started using the app I have done well in monitoring my blood sugars. I had slacked off and now I am back on it and this app will keep me going. Thank you glucose buddy.

title: Review
body: User friendly for the most part; would like the capability to e-mail graphs and data to interested parties such as physicians, et al.  Print out capability would be good, too.

title: simple perfect
body: All i wanted was a simple way to track my BGL add some notes and be able look at charted averages... I can email an organized chart of my levels to my Dr which is all that i need, although much more is available... Thanks!

title: Tops in my book
body: I have used a number of software programs for tracking my numbers and this is by far (and away) the best ever. Easy to use, easy to set up, great tracking charts and the support is NOW and awesome. Keep up the great work, all of us appreciate it.

title: Password
body: I love this app! However, for most people, weight is a sensitive issue and it is part of our profile to help with calculations of the data. Because of this, it would be nice if this app has a password lock.

title: Great for recording numbers on the go.
body: My 14-year-old Type 1 son is great about testing, but not recording, so if we're out without his book I can enter it here. Then I don't have to keep asking him over again. I'm a little confused about how to enter meds and exercise, though, thus the 4 star rating.

title: Easy to use!
body: I'm trying to manage gestational diabetes; this app is easy and quick to record readings. The graphs are very unhelpful for me, and the program that you can integrate food data from continually crashes my phone, so is not a helpful feature either. otherwise great!

title: Love this app!
body: This program has been invaluable in helping me to keep track of my blood sugar readings.  Love that I can look it up on the website as well.  Also keeps track of my blood pressure and weight. Worth every penny.  Well done.

title: New to this
body: I am pre-diabetic and just starting to monitor my glucose, but this app is turning out to be a handy tool. I plan to show my numbers to my doctor the next time I visit, and with this app I don't have to bring anything but my phone with me. Thanks!

title: Fantastic ap
body: One of the best aps that I have seen.  Use it every day.  Even my diabetes coordinator was impressed with the application.  Only wish there was a place to record blood pressure on this version, without having too spend $6.99.

title: Couldn't be happier with this app
body: I needed something to record my sugar multiple times a day and this app is perfect to record not just my sugar but what I ate as well. So pleased I don't have to carry a paper around and just use my phone.

title: Great Way to Log my Results
body: I used this app a few years back and I wasn't able to sync anything. But now they seem to have fixed all the issues I had before and it works great for me.

title: Not so sure anymore
body: Just got notified that this app needs to be undated.  The developer needs to update the app or it won't work with newer versions of iOS. And to think I spent money to go pro. Might have to change apps.

title: Great App!
body: I REALLY love this app! It has helped me keep track of my Diabetes. One suggestion though, I'm Type 2, but I don't use insulin, I use oral medications to control my BG. I would like to be able to keep track of my pills, (i.e dosage,) in the medication section. Otherwise, it's perfect!

title: Great tool for Diabetics
body: Just got this App.  I have been struggling with my sugars and this gives me great information on where my highs and lows are.  The graphs and charts are 1st rate.  I feel like I am armed with enough information to make intelligent decisions with my doctor on wha we can do to lower my A1C

title: Great!
body: Overall I really enjoy using glucose buddy.  It is really easy to use.  My only complaint is that I don't like the graph.  I don't understand it. However the maps online are much easier to read and understand. So I would highly suggest synching it and going online.

title: Most used app on my phone!
body: I've used GB every day for close to a year now. It may not be perfect, but it is an excellent tool that has allowed me to keep track of my health & weight, and most importantly control my diabetes without meds. Thank you GB team!

title: great app!
body: This app is an excellent tool for diabetics. I find the interface very easy to use. The logging, notes, historical graphs, and web interface give me everything I need to help manage my BG numbers and effectively relay those

title: Works great
body: Gives me just what I need to give doctor my info. Would be nice of it had push notification or alarm to remind you about specific meal time or to nudge you of you hadn't entered a number in x# of hours / days. Also would be nice if it assumed the category based on time of day.

title: Great app!
body: Since I started using insulin 2 1/2 months ago, I downloaded this app to help me keep track of my diabetes. It's awesome! And the best thing about it is I am able to show my doctor my logs. It's so convenient to have all my info in one place!

title: Great way to help control the sugars!!
body: I have been a diabetic for over 30 years.  The tools available for new diabetics including this one leave NO EXCUSES for uncontrolled diabetes.  I am beginning to start to try to get mused into control to save my life for real.  This app helps me TREMENDOUSLY!!!

title: Glucose buddy
body: Nice app but it doesn't allow much room for add'l notes. You can put them in but you can't read them as a whole note. Don't like that it keeps trying to get you to upgrade to pro. Other than that, I like the way it looks and seems easy to use.

title: I like the concept
body: It only took me day to find my way around this app and I find it really helpful to have all my information, blood glucose, medicine and food, visible at one time on one screen. I like it a lot. It's easy to use.

title: Katie Rater
body: As a diabetic educator AND as a person with diabetes, I found this to be a great app to help manage your diabetes. The "Testing in Pairs" let's you see the effect of something you do or what you eat, on your blood sugar. That information helps you make good choices. I highly recommend this app to anyone testing blood sugars.

title: An old fart
body: My doctor was very impressed when I showed her my blood sugars for the last two weeks.  I plan on using your program in future.  Thank you for providing it's use.  Perhaps a graphic presentation with recommended blood sugar levels wold be helpful also.  My IPad blood sugar recording chart has such a graph and is very good on giving me the trends.  thank you!

title: Great app but room for improvement
body: App makes it easy to keep track of my bs if it doesn't hang up. Frustrating when it won't sync with their server. Notifications not working at all. Fix all the small annoying bugs and it's a 5 star app.

title: Glucose Buddy
body: I remain impressed by the functionality of this app and the reporting capabilities of the website. A truly great app.

title: Glucose buddy
body: This is one of the best apps that I have down loaded. I have all my BG readings  at a glance. I'm able to send to my computer and then print it out and bring    the print out to my doctor or I can show by BG readings right from the phone.

title: Glucose Buddy
body: Since finding out 6.5 months ago that I have type 2 diabetes I have used Glucose Buddy daily to track my progress in getting a handle on this disease that was out of control. I would be lost without it!!

title: Glucose Buddy
body: I love this app! It's so easy to use. I also add my weight in the notes section. Now I'm able to track my weight and glucose in one location. I no longer have to search my house for the paper log I kept.

title: Nothing better yet.
body: I've tried a couple of these and this on seems to be the best so far. Although I always have the feeling something better could be done.

title: Awesome for a busy diabetic who doesn't like to keep a logbook
body: I love this!!!! I'm sooo busy lately and I always forget my logbook, but I bring my iPod everywhere with me!!! I love it and so do my parents and doctor. He can track what my sugar us doing by the graphs. It is truly a masterpiece!!!!!

title: awesome app
body: It's very cool app because I don't have to write on paper anymore. It give me what I need however it's little restriction for me because I want to make my own label (out of bed, before breakfast etc. I want to put "low sugar" or like that.

title: GB
body: I love the fact that I can also keep track of weight and blood pressure. Thus makes it easy to show all the information to my doctor all in one place. I like that I can e-mail him that same information.

title: My most use App.......*****
body: My BG level in July, 2010 was 498 with A1C 16.5. I went to VA Medical for 10 days. After the stay, I started using this App and I swear by it. With the Doctors help, eating right and daily use of this after 3 months my BG average is 124.5 and my A1C is 6.4. I was taking 7 shots a day to now 0.  I love it!

title: Does what I need
body: Although this app looks like it has a lot of cool features, it's still simple enough where I can simply record my readings. I am only "watching" my blood sugar per the recommendation of my OB (though not diabetic), and this is perfect. Thanks!

title: Excellent
body: The first program of it's type I can happily use without cables and a degree in computer science. Like the chart feature. Please make a version for the iPad and I would be happy to pay for a version without ads.

title: Mrs
body: I like how I can see all my readings at the same time and compare them.  O can see what foods make my numbers increase and use it as a guide to determine what foods are not good for me.  My doctor loves how she can see everything in one place with my notes.  I love it.

title: Glucose Buddy Review
body: Used GB for the past 4 months. I enter everything from my phone and then sync to my computer. Easy to use. Easy to sync. Provides great data and charts for doctor visits generated by the computer. I highly recommend this App for people trying to manage their diabetes.

title: Solid
body: Does the basics very very well, and that's a huge step

title: Easy to use
body: I just started using this app. I like it so far. It's easy to use and I like the notes function because I can add what I ate that made my readings high/low. I wish it had a timer to alert me when I need to test myself after meals. I will continue using this app.

title: Easy to use
body: Like the fact that you can sync and then download your numbers to a file which can be imported into Excel.  I used this to print out my numbers for my doctor.

title: Needs an update to current IOS.
body: Apple pop ups about once a month saying this app will cause issues unless it gets updated to the current IOS version.

title: Solid application; responsive developer
body: Very clean initial application. Contacted the developer about some questions and suggestions, and heard back right away. They're already working on pretty much everything I was wondering about for the next update. Highly recommended.

title: great app
body: This app is a great tool to help one stay in control. Love the graph and the ability to email my logs to my self and my doctor to keep track of my progress. This makes it easy for one to stay on top and stay in control.

title: Tattletales
body: Glucose Buddy keeps me honest by tracking my numbers and keeping it "in my face."  It is one of the most necessary apps on my iPad and not only a motivator for keep my diabetes in check, but for me to control my diet, my weight and my overall physical condition.  Thanks "Buddy"!

title: Amazing for diabetics
body: Pretty much what everyone else is saying is true! No more using a real logbook or paper just pull your phone out of your pocket takes literally 15 seconds and your done

title: Type 2 using insulin
body: Started taking insulin in late February and Glucose Buddy has been invaluable to me for tracking carbs, insulin and glucose levels, making it easier to get myself under the best control I've had in years. Simply awesome!

title: Solid app. Needs to be iPad ready
body: Great app. Does what it advertises and more. Hope the developers create an iPad ready version.

title: Organization fix
body: The app itself is great and I give it 4 stars for that. I love being able to keep my logs in an app that than transfers to the online database. But one problem..the organization of the logs is horrible. The organization really needs fixed. Please..please work on it.

title: If your diabetic...you NEED this app
body: This app is so easy to use and fast to update long term data in my desktop and then provide useful info to my dr by either email or printed graphs and reports.  This app is a must for easy management of diabetes

title: Wonderful Ap. For your phone.
body: I recently downloaded this ap. I find it very easy to use. It is a must have for anyone that has diabetes. People always have their phone with them.  Very easy to pull up to show the Dr.

title: Fantastic App
body: This app does an amazing job in tracking my activities. Putting everything in a graph is the perfect way of monitoring your diabetic progress. And it's so easy. If you can text, you can easily use this app.

title: Excellent App
body: This is the best diabetes tracking app available. Easy interface, user friendly, and syncs quickly. You can add notes to a log entry, and it's easy to delete duplicate entries. This is one app that I couldn't live without.

title: Good, could be Great
body: One tweak would greatly improve its user-friendliness.  My # 1 gripe:  why does the time label default to "Out of Bed," even at night or after I've labeled other entries as "after dinner" or other categories?

title: Love this app
body: It has made it very easy to log my readings into it for tracking it rather than having to through my meter.  I only wish it had a better graph depicting the information.

title: Very helpful
body: This app is great for keeping quick, easy track of your numbers. The graph is great but seems a bit limited. I wish I could manipulate the data more. I'd like to be able to graph individual components ie out of bed, or before dinner.  Overall it's been very helpful.

title: Awesome app!!
body: So glad I found this app. Very handy dandy because I can use it where ever I am. Best part is I can snap shot the graph and text or email it to my Dr. So easy to use, my 5 & 8 yr old granddaughters enter my results. If you're diabetic, this is a must have!!!!

title: This app works
body: Not only can I keep track of blood sugar, but with a little tweaking to some of the items, you can track meds and weight. For free! Get real folks, this app is just about as good as it can get.

title: Diabetic
body: Great aid to keep track of my Diabetes. I use it thee times a day.  I like the graph to see an overview of the numbers.  I can show the doctor my phone because I always for get my log book.  I always have my phone.

title: Hasn't been updated for awhile
body: OK for recording and getting trends but does not flag patterns. I hesitate to pay because of the long time between updates. Recording carbs could be better like remembering previous carb count and allowing exchanges instead of grams. Needs to have different graphs/log view such as by time or days.

title: Painfully Outdated
body: This thing is in serious need of an update. It *still* hadn't been updated to support 4" screens yet. That means it's written for 3.5" screens which Apple doesn't even sell anymore. It's embarrassing. I would gladly pay good money for a modern up-to-date version of the app; especially if it took advantage of the new HealthKit APIs.

title: Great app!!
body: Ever since I downloaded this app I've had a much better handle on monitoring and controlling my diabetes.  It's so convenient to have this info so readily available.  My doctor appreciates that she can check my progress at a glance.

title: Was a great app,, now not so much
body: These sort of updates usually come about because there is a new boss on the team...

title: Easy to use
body: Easy to use and sync between my iPhone, iPad, and the web site. My only complaint is against the web site. It should support the same units the application provides.

title: Use it all the time
body: I keep a paper log book, but I also use this app. I like the graphs and being able to sync it to the web site. I would like to do a two-way sync without paying so much. I haven't bought that feature.

title: Delete log entries
body: This is a GOOD app. I have been using it since it first came out. However it would be a GREAT app if you can add some of the iPhone's native features such as "edit, select and delete" so we can delete some log entries on my iPhone. Right now, we can only do one at a time. To do so, you have to click each entry and then click delete. You can't even swipe to delete.

title: Good app
body: I use this app daily. It is a great way to keep track of blood sugar. I send reports via email to doctor. This makes it easy and convenient to stay on top of. One suggestion: because many diabetics have CKD Perhaps you could list all vitamins, minerals and other vital information

title: Love it!
body: I've been a type 1 diabetic since 1991. For 20 years I've hoped that there was a quick and easy way to record BG's. It is the best way to make sense of your patterns and trends with hi's and lo's and seeing keeps things balanced and pushing things to the limit.

title: Works well
body: This has been very helpful with keeping trackof my numbers, and medications. And I really like being able to print just what I need to show my doctor, rather than my badly handwritten notes.

title: Really helped me!
body: I'm 16 and terrible at managing my diabetes and this really helped! Especially since I'm always on my phone anyways so I always see it and never forget to use it! Definitely would recommend!

title: Great free app
body: This app makes it really easy for me to track my sugar levels. I appreciate how easy it is to use and how easy it was to sync to my computer. I just wish you didn't have to pay extra to use some of the other features.

title: Excellent!
body: This app is very convenient and that's exactly what I was looking for...convenience. Also, it's not cluttered with a bunch of extras that I don't need. I'm still contemplating upgrading to the paid version but I should have a decision soon.

title: Bs
body: Love this app easy to use abl to mail to your self or to your doctor. I just started checking my levers daily and this helps so much.  Thank you for making a app that helps much that is easy to use daily

title: Just got it
body: Just got it, looks great. Hopefully never need to enter BGL over 500, but that should be fixed. If my previous review gets posted, the time problem was mine. It was right there in front of me, i missed it. Need to give it a good workout. Like the Testing in Pairs info on glucose testing.

title: DOWNGRADEÓê°Óê°Óê°
body: Very good app until I upgraded to 3.6.5. Now it takes forever to load and crashes frequently. The ads on the bottom maybe the culprit. What a disappointment. I should never have upgraded. It was more or less a DOWNGRADE.

title: GB great product
body: I have been using this product for about 5 months and it is great for keeping track of my glucose level as oppose to writing it down. This help to eliminate one item from my glucose monitoring kit. Keep up the good work.

title: Madebad
body: Using to track blood sugar and BP. So far it has been excellent due to convenience, ease of use, and multiple input parameters. Looking forward to using more features and providing my doc with a thorough history. Fantastic app!

title: Would be okay...
body: It's a great idea and the way things are organized in it is good. But for some reason I can't choose my meter type (it just keeps switching back to the top selection) and I can't even tap some of the things to ad info. Someone needs to fix these problems and I'll give it 5 starts.

title: App is so helpful!
body: I love that I can get rid of my lil paper notebook that I used to track all of this exact info with before! It is very handy and helpful. Also, I love the fact that it acknowledges Type 1.5 (LADA). I was diagnosed with Type 1.5 almost 3 years ago at 25. It is rare that this type is recognized!

title: Perfectly Simple
body: I love how easy it is to keep track of my blood sugar.  My meter is a mini and a log book just does not fit inside it's case. This app is great for keeping track of  everything.

title: Great App, helps keeping on track!
body: I love this app.  Now I can better track my progress and get motivated to do my best in keeping my BG under control.

title: Great helper
body: I love that it has access to blogs with other diabetic members. I like the easy to log features, the only thing to improve might be the amount of words you are aloud to put in the notes section. Definitely a big help overall!

title: Great app
body: I use 3 different meters (work, home, car) so it's nice that I can enter all readings into my iPod and have them all together.  This app helped me significantly lower evening glucose simply by changing time not dosage of oral med and did this while on 2 week road trip.

title: Love the online syncing
body: Been using this app for 3 days and love how easy it is to use. Best part is that it syncs to a free online database where u can view graphs and print them out! Using this app to keep track of my son's bg numbers.

title: Great app
body: I was just diagnosed with diabetes and have to test my sugar three times a day.i love that it is so handy and that I can print out my readings for my doctor. I use more than one Meter to test so having all my readings in one place is good. Very good app for free.

title: LOVE THIS APP!!!!!
body: This App has been a big help in getting my A1C down to where it should be.

title: Awesome!
body: Great app, it's nice to be able to keep tabs on what my sugars have been all in a glance. Email them to my dr easily too which I love! Trying to sync with the calorie counter/exercise app but have haven't been successful. Otherwise love it!

title: Quick and easy
body: Sometimes it may be a little too complicated, and also there should be a daily calendar in which you can see blood sugars at different times during the day in a timeline format

title: Thanks!
body: I have just started to monitor and this is an easy way to record things.  I like reading the forums.  Since I'm new to Diabetes it's nice to be able to read stories from other people like me.

title: No muss, no fuss, intuitive
body: I've tried a bunch of glucose apps over the years but this is the best. Straight-forward, clean design. I enter my numbers, I can see trends over time, and I can take it in to my doctor. Does eveything I need. Great app.

title: LogBook Rocks
body: As a new user I have found this app very user friendly! Easy to edit, easy to sync! My only complaint is I wish I could just email log to dr. But Health System we use isn't that advanced yet! Lol

title: I use this app every day!
body: Needs a starter manual or maybe a "show me" video. Over the years I've tried a few of these apps. I keep coming back to this one because it seems to be the best for me.

title: Needs tweaks but GREAT
body: Needs A1C setting and needs weight above 341 to at least 400 BUT this program has helped me go from a 9.5 A1C two months ago to a 7.3; a reduction my endocrinologist said was "outstanding" and he likes the reports I fax as well.

title: Made a difference
body: Changed my habits and improved my health. The ease of use made me more likely to test and record, and to change my food choices based on readings. I've lost 30 lbs and dropped from an 8.9 A1c to a 6.2 in 3.5 mos by cutting carbs and closely watching the meter as I improved.  Great tool.

title: Great app
body: I really like this app. Recently started on insulin and needed something to help me keep track on my iPad, not only can I keep track, view a graph of my bs to get better control, but I can also email to my doctor. Love it!!!

title: Great bg app
body: I like everything about this app except that the graphs are not very helpful to me. Having said that, I have not been able to find an app with superior graphs, so I can't complain too much. Glucose Buddy allows you to download your data, so I just dump it into Excel and graph there.

title: Better than paper
body: When I first loaded the app I was still keeping a paper log. It only took a week to say goodbye to the old log book. I really like the program and look forward to even more integration to my health program.

title: Helpful!
body: This is a great app for monitoring my blood sugar levels.  Having a web site to store and display the information is a good way to track my history.  Easy to use and well laid out.

title: Neat tool
body: I am using the freebie version and it works like it should and for what I need. I needed to keep track of my readings/meds/insulin and regular paper and pen wasnt working for me. This is a handy tool for people on the go.  I would recommend it.

title: Good ap for pets
body: I use it to track and send my cat's levels to the vet to monitor dosage. The meal information helps (while not accurate because of snacking) the vet. Would like it to run on iPad. And hope to have an integrated testing device directly feed to ap one day.

title: Great app!
body: I was recently diagnosed with gestational diabetes and am tracking my glucose four times a day. I have been using this app daily and I love it. I also love that I can email my log to myself and print for my doctors appointment!

title: Simple great for new Type 2
body: It does everything and is simple to use. Blood glucose tracking is fine, graphing won't show high levels ( goes off scale) and wot function horizontally.

title: GB good selling CT app bad!
body: This app is very good. The companion app Calorie Tracker detracts from this app. GB would have been better served by expanding the notes section to track carbs, calories and exercise rather that push a second app where the foods in it's database are uncommon. Try finding grapes or pretzels on that app without manually inputting...

title: Helpful
body: I'm type 2. This app has been helpful for tracking glucose and it is easy to use. There are companion apps for tracking food, weight, etc., but the integration is poor and they are not as stable.  I recommend this app; but don't bother with the add-ons at this time.

title: Love the app, however
body: The calories burned for activities is WAY off!!! 3 hours of road biking burns waaaay more calories then the around 80 or 100 the app states. In 3 hours I ride about 35 miles on a road bike...peddling. I know I'm burning more then the app says. Other activities are way off too. But as a log just for glucose tracking...I love it. It's super easy.

title: I'd be screwed without this
body: As a newly diagnosed diabetic this app has been invaluable. Only thing that bothers me is that the notes don't read clearly when you write more than a few words.

title: Glucose Buddy
body: My buddy on the go   Morning Noon and Nite    Just can't live without my glucose buddy     Has been a very good  and great help for me in managing my blood sugar   I have been using this app for some time and it is a lot of help and keeps me on track   Thank you  Buddy mu Buddy

title: Amazing!!
body: Made my life so much easier I actually want to take my blood sugar more often just to see my improvements and result logged can't wait to buy the premium version

title: Great app with two minor qualms
body: Really reliable, and syncs easily between iPhone and iPad. But I wish it took up the whole screen length of the newer iPhones, and you can rearrange the icons within the app, but they revert to the original settings upon restarting the app.

title: Lacks better export options
body: App seems great but lacks better exporting options. Would be nice to see graph option as export. You see the graph in app but not as export option? Capture option renders horrible quality and it's only a snap shot of the screen (view). This is paid app version.

title: Great app keeps you motivated.
body: I really like this app and it keeps me motivated to be on top of my numbers. I'm sure like anything it could be it improved but it's the best one so far that I've come across, thank you.

title: Larry45
body: Have been using this app for about 3 years and find it very useful. Only problem is that I can't interface with my IPhone 6 Health Kit. I have other apps which automatically sync (i.e workouts, Walking Distance & Steps) with Helath Kit, but can't correlate exercise with Blood Glucose levels. Need to be able to synch with Health Kit!

title: DIABETIC, Add YEARS to your LIFE!!!!
body: A user for the past month and a half. I Love it. I now check levels at least once a day and its graph feature "is worth a thousand words". I also register my insulin intake and exercise. Worth every penny and more.

title: Great App
body: I use this app almost everyday. Very useful and helpful. My favorite feature is where it gives me the average numbers for all my readings which I can convert into a A1C number. I recommend this app to everyone.

title: Great for focus
body: Logging the data is easy. My iphone's timer makes it easy not to miss a reading. Love being able to see a graph. But I am having problems changing the factor to graph (BP or weight instead of BG)

title: Good App
body: Thus is a good app to keep track of glucose levels. It seems to have trouble linking up with glucose buddy website. I would give it 5 stars if it would print directly from the app instead of logging onto website and downloading Csv and printing that.

title: Review
body: I really enjoy the handiness of having my results where I can look at them whenever I need to. The only thing I would like to be able to record my own time

title: Great App!
body: My daughter found this app for me because I just couldn't remember to update my journal because I would never have it with me. Makes it much easier for my endocrinologist to see how I'm doing.

title: Awesome helper
body: Trying to track my gluclose has always been hard, but having something on hand is awesome. I love the notes option so I can keep track of what is going on.

title: Bs log *****
body: Great app! By being able to monitor my bs closely with just a glance was able to get be out of 400+ levels down to 100' s! Because I was so high confusion was bad so I entered them rt away and at dr ofc just showed all at a glance! Thank you!

title: Good app most of the time.
body: This new version no longer works with my 1st generation ipod touch.  Since they have been increasing the server capability things with syncing have become much better. Now they need to get healthkit support installed and it would be awesome.

title: Great App for Tracking Blood Glucose
body: I use this app everyday and use it to review my levels with my physician. The only complaint is that it should be a better way to print graph results using the online version. Otherwise, I'm pleased with the app.

title: Glucose Buddy
body: Was using a former app that I'd used on my PalmPilot for years. Found GB and jumped onboard immediately. It has been super. And continues to get better all the time.  This latest update just makes it better than the best.

title: Good App:
body: Glucose Buddy is a good app. It does help you to keep track your glucose readings in a electronic log book instead of having to use a paper one. It would be good if Glucose Buddy could interface with glucose monitors, like the Ultra One Touch from Lifescan.

title: Excellent helper!
body: This app has been a wonderful way for me to keep track of my daily blood glucose and even estimate my A1c. Love the fact that I can track my exercise daily, as well. Highly recommend!!!

title: Great app
body: I have used several apps to manage my blood sugar.  I like this one best.  It's simple to use. And record keeping is a strength.  I have recommended it to diabetic friends and family. My doc likes it too.

title: Need to print out report!
body: I dearly love this app except for one thing.  I need to have the ability to print my logs out! Now that we must present our logs to the pharmacist before obtaining our test strips, I don't know what to do?  Please some help from the developers??!

title: Love this app!
body: This is a very useful, user friendly app. Keeps track of all meds and blood sugar readings for you and along with My Fitness Pal makes a terrific weight loss program. Highly recommend this app!

title: Makes things easy.
body: Helps me to keep track. Prints my glucose level for my doc and allows me to keep it as a journal. Only thing I would like added would be a list that allows easy input of type of insulin taken and units.

title: Glucose reading
body: I depend on this glucose reading as I have a medical condition that requires me to check my blood pressure also my blood sugar levels and this is very helpful for me it has kept me on reason really strict diet thank you

title: Gil
body: I've been using this app to track and monitor my glucose for several years and it's never failed yet! Easy to use and customize for different meds. Try it!

title: Glucose Buddy does my record keeping on the go
body: GB is a user friendly log that provides a handy log for my readings while on the go. GB also will sync the saved test results if needed & provides a graph and averages.

title: Nice App! But could you add one thing?
body: I like the Glucose Buddy app and it's features, however, I also monitor my BP as part of my Diabetes Care. Would it be too much to add BP data tracking to this app? Otherwise, I have to get both BP Buddy and Glucose Buddy and track them in two separate data bases. Thanks!

title: Glucose buddy
body: BEST glucose tracker. Does what it says and well. Never crashes. My doctor finds the graphs and online reports invaluable. All of the others either don't work or crash. Spent 8 bucks till I found this.

title: Good App
body: I like the ease of use and love being able to use it with the website! The one thing I didn't like was having to buy an addition for weight & blood pressure, then it didn't incorporate them into the BG log. That was definitely not worth the $3.99.

title: I love Glucose Buddy!!
body: I have struggled for many years to regularly test my blood sugar and record the logs. Since getting this app, I have improved 100% and am proud to have something to show my doctor. Use this app!! :)

title: Glucose Buddy
body: This app has been extremely helpful in the management of my Type II diabetes. It gives me the opportunity to share my readings with my physician and me the comfort in knowing I am doing what's needed to maintain a healthy lifestyle. Thank you.

title: Glucose buddy
body: Glucose buddy allows me to track my blood sugar and log it on a daily basis on my iPhone. The graph shows me how on or off my levels are and it allows me to share with my health practitioner with out having to command things to memory or log books.

title: Love it!!
body: I love this app. I can log by blood sugar readings and my A1C. It is important to me to be able to have a place to log that and more so I can show my doctor and I know myself what I need to do. Love the note section too!!

title: Satisfied
body: Using this app for the last couple of days and so far I am happy with the functionality of this app. Just wish the pro app wasn't so pricey. Other than that I'm satisfied.

title: Exactly what I needed
body: I love everything about this app. Only thing I would tweak is adding the ability to send more than one week of blood sugar readings. But this is definitely a five-star app.

title: HORRIBLE UPDATE!
body: I've had Glucose Buddy for about a year and loved it until now. This latest update and change is completely useless. It does not allow to log glucose readings with a corresponding meal or fasting and I no longer see a graph. You ruined a great thing. What a shame after paying 6.99 for it months ago to now have to find another app altogether that does what I need it to and what my Doctor will appreciate.

title: Decent App
body: This app is decent. All I think that it could use is on the graph it should have average blood glucose levels graphed for certain times of day. Morning should be a color, afternoon should be a color, and evening. If this is added I would give this app 5 stars.

title: Good
body: I use this ALL the time. Thus app helps a TON! thanks. P.S. There are plenty of other app out there that cost $30 more than this one...and they do absolutely NOTHING! Don't waste your money on $h¬°+¬• apps when you can get this one for nothing!!!!! title: My Doctor was impressed with this app
body: My Doctor wants all his patients to keep a record like this app. He found the graphs especially helpful when we took our graphs printed out for him to see.

title: Nice but a full iPad version would be great
body: A useful app, but I'm not a fan of the hamster wheel input.  An iPad version would be great.  An app with a spreadsheet or table option for entering data from multiple days.  Sometimes I forget and must enter multiple entries from paper.

title: Great help
body: This app has helped me get my diabetes under control. The chart is especially helpful. I can see how I'm doing! It actually reminds me to test! Something I wasn't doing regularly before I started using Glucose Buddy.

title: GB Thoughts
body: This is a helpful app and it works well. I do wish I could change the graph to see averages for specific times of day as well as daily averages. The link to the calorie app does work, but that is the calorie app and not GB. But having a working link would be helpful.

title: Does just what I want...and then some!
body: I wanted an app that recorded my daily blood sugar numbers, converted that data into a graph form and had an open "chat" room where I could get and share information and experiences. Hello G/B. I love it!

title: Excellent App!
body: Glucose Buddy has helped me keep tighter control of my blood sugar. I've had no real problems with this app. Sometimes it doesn't sync my readings, but I attribute that to my wi-fi. Is there an iPad version in the future?

title: Glucose
body: This App makes life so much easier keeping track of my blood sugar! I'm able to email my Doctors my numbers right from my phone or computer. A must have for Diabetics

title: Food log glitchy
body: Love the simplicity of the app. Love the ability to email log to my physician. I'm struggling with the food log. Seems glitch as I'm not able to select the food and the amount. The only option for portion is defaulted to gram.

title: Excellent!!! Must have!!!
body: This is the best log that I have found! I have tried several others, and this one keeps track of everything!

title: Yay! Charts are back!!!
body: The 3.1 update certainly addressed all of my issues. This program is FAST, has an elegant interface, and provides abilities that leave all the other BG apps in the dust. Thanks to MYLEstone Health for listening to user desires and acting promptly.

title: Well Designed and Convenient
body: I have used it for a few weeks now, and have found it to be well thought out and convenient to use.

title: Great app
body: I have using Glucose Buddy for months. Found this app and love it. Makes it so easy to record as I have my phone w me always. It is fast and doesn't freeze up like the web page does. Even syncs to the web account. Love it!

title: Perfect app for me
body: Just what I needed.  Simple, easy to use, good functionality.  I've tried other apps for tracking but got rid of them all an only use this one now.

title: Can't create an account
body: I spent hours uploading my handwritten notes to Glucose Buddy for the purpose of sending the information to my nurse. However, I cannot create an account via the Glucose Buddy website! I receive a message each time that indicates that there is an internal server problem.  I've reported this to their support website, and haven't heard back after 2 days.  Fail!

title: Super convenient
body: Easiest and most convenient way I've found of keeping track of BG levels. Graphing function gives you a nice visual of your patterns. Highly recommended.

title: Good but...
body: I like this app. it is simple to use and visually appealing. But, there is one glaring flaw and it is glaring. The sync with the website feature rarely works and has been a known problem for some time. If they fixed that problem I would give it a 4.5 instead.

title: Nice for sugar tracking
body: This app works great for sugar tracking but seems to have a lot of useless functions that make it appear cluttered

title: Great app, but a bit dated user interface
body: I love this app.  It is easy to use and has helped me keep track of my blood sugars and medicines.

title: Radiantbrook
body: This is simply the best app, I have it on my iPhone. No more writing in those log books that don't even give you enough room to write much of anything.  I know my doctor will love it!

title: Ok
body: I would like to see morning levels have their own line on the graph along with all the different times of day. Also I would like to see a chart where the actual numbers are shown with days on one side and times of day (after breakfast, ect) on the other side.

title: Amazing app!
body: Easy to use with great features. I especially like being able to have a graph that shows my blood sugar level over several days!

title: Simply Awesome
body: I've been always having problems keeping everything on track. This app is just a amazing app for diabetics to have with you at all times.

title: Easy to use
body: Very good app for keeping track of blood glucose records, as well as weight and blood pressure. Does not sync well with the calorie counter app, though. I think that's more of a problem with that app than this one, however. All in all a good app.

title: Mind blowing
body: Very simple to use, keep every data that you input. I went through several programs that made so many promises

title: Great App!
body: This is a great App. Helped me track my glucose level to help keep it level. My doctor lives it too. It gives her a full picture of my levels for long periods of time. Thank you!

title: Great App
body: I was recently diagnosed with diabetes. This came as a complete shock. This app helped me track my glucose, a1c, food consumption, exercise. This app helped teach me the effects of different foods and exercise at different times of the day. Thanks for the great app.

title: Used for 6 months love it
body: Best app for tracking all my vitals. Makes doctors visit more meaningful when they can review history not just current point data.

title: Such a big help!
body: This has been so helpful and able to email the documents to my doctor is even better.

title: Thanks for bringing back the graphs!
body: Thanks for bringing back the graphs on the app. That's really HUGE. This is a wonderful app for the diabetic. It would be great if you could do the same type of graph on the website. This is really an awesome app!

title: Good App for Diabetics
body: I like the app a lot.

title: Helpful
body: I always had trouble remembering to check my blood sugar until this. Now before my doctors visit I can just print it out for me. The calorie tracker is also useful!

title: Can't even input my info
body: Not sure why it stops at 341 pounds, but helloooooo a lot of people with diabetes are very overweight. I realize I'm outside the norm of even just "overweight", but it's supposed to be a health app. Accommodate everyone please. Increase weight input spinner. Speaking of which, why is it a spinner? Why can't I just enter a number instead of scrolling past 11 pounds, 12 pounds ...... just to find out it doesn't go high enough anyway.

title: Great app
body: This has been very helpful visualizing my blood sugars on a daily basis. Even though some glucose monitors can graph your blood glucose results, it is much easier to see with this app and the bigger screen on the phone. I would recommend this app.

title: So Helpful!
body: Having the multi device sync is great, albeit an expensive add-on!  I can sync between my phone, iPad, and laptop so I can keep track of my glucose levels wherever I am. That makes me more compliant with both my blood sugar and meds.

title: Decent
body: I like the ability to add unique notes to each segment. I would like the ability to edit existing logs with regards to food, insulin, activity etc. the only thing that is editable in the bg level. A bit frustrating. Also takes a long time to load the app.

title: Good app, but not complete
body: The app doesn't integrate with Calorie Counter due to calorie counter crashing.  While this may seem like someone else problem - this stuff should get tested and hasn't been. Cutting corners usually start this way.

title: Makes it easy to keep track
body: Does a great job of keeping track of readings and medications without going to the extreme. My doctor loves the reports. Just wish there was a way to have readings transfer automatically from meters

title: Great app
body: Really helps me keep track of my blood sugar. A 100% better than my previous paper log book. Like the ability to capture my logs and send to my doctor.

title: Very nice, so far
body: I hadn't realized what I was missing with the app I was using until I downloaded this one today. I LOVE that I can personalize my menu of foods and that what I eat shows up on the screen. This was my biggest complaint with the other app I have.

title: Great App.
body: I was recently diagnosed with type 2 diabetes. Glucose Buddy has helped me understand the importance of daily glucose monitoring and has assisted me in lowering my daily glucose average. I have tried other apps & Glucose Buddy is the best one I have used.

title: CD
body: Excellent app wish it had more detail on the graph such as more detailed time listings and days of the week, also it should display the medication amount on the graph in order to see the trend in dosage vs, glucose levels and how they correlate to each other.

title: Great idea
body: I used to keep booklet after booklet with daily readings. Now I just enter them in my iPhone or iPad and print put the graphs for a better picture of how I am doing. Great app, couldn't do with out it!

title: Best app around
body: I've tried all the apps available, I have to say Glucose Buddy is the best. It has really help me maintain my sugar. But it sometimes doesn't open now that I'm using iOS 5. Keeps crashing on me. Someone needs to fix this problem.

title: Easier than a log book
body: I love this app! Even gets my kids interested in my diabetes control. So much better than writing in a log book.

title: Absolute lifesaver!
body: The app has been a G-dsend. I was diagnosed back in may of this year and this app has helped not only me to manage my blood sugar but to communicate my numbers efficiently to my doctor. Thank you so much.

title: Great App
body: I have installed this app on all of my iPhones and one iPod.  It is wonderful for keeping up with glucose level and offers so many other great features.  5 star product.

title: Glucose Buddy
body: Started using Glucose Buddy a few days ago. I was searching for an that helped track my blood glucose and this is just right for me. Saved me from

title: Glucose Control
body: Glucose Buddy has made tracking my blood sugars so convenient.  In the past 3 months my A1C has gone from a 12.8 (way out of control) to a 7.5 (almost home).  Thanks!!

title: Great App
body: I use this every day multiple times. Lets my wife know what is going on without her having to ask. Looking for true two-way syncing. Don't mind that my data is being used for research. I get so much out of this app.

title: Crash work around.
body: The app crashes when you use the "+" key to add a new log under the new iOS 4, but if you use the "add log" button it works fine. Thank you to the Glucose Buddy support team for emailing me this solution!

title: Not worth the price...
body: This is a case of getting what you pay for.  I downloaded and waited (then waited and waited and waited some more) for my activation email that would have allowed me to use the app.  It never came.  I sent a note to their help account and guess what?  No reply.  Given the buzz in some communities about not being able to sync to web servers, I'm thinking the developers have abandoned this app.

title: Magnificent!
body: WARNING - Back up your graph or make photos of it before you upgrade to the latest version because the graph will DISAPPEAR!!!!

title: Simple
body: The app is easy to use and offers many tracking options. I use every day to track my exercise and glucose levels. I love this app.

title: GREAT !!!
body: Wonderful tool to keep my Doc abreast of my levels.  I am impressed with the before and after exercise tools.  It has kept me exercising, even when I don't feel like exercising !

title: Great App!!
body: This is much easier to do than trying to find a log book & pen every time I check my blood glucose. I wish I could give it 10 stars!!
