title: Used this app
body: Since I download this app, it's help me show my doctors where my glucose levels better! Plus it reminds me about what I have eaten when it shows high numbers!!

title: Great app for logging
body: This is the perfect app for keeping track of your sugar levels, it saves the logs to a website that you can print out later

title: Rarely connects, even the site is slow.
body: I have been unable to get any of my results to sync for four days now.  Constant ‚Äúunable to connect‚Äù messages from app.  Wish I would have never paid for the app or, since I did, I wish the developer would put my money toward a more reliable hosting company.

title: Glucose Buddy
body: I have NEVER been good about writing with paper and pencil to log anything.

title: Best app for BG testing!
body: I've been diagnosed with hypoglycemia & needed a way to keep track of my readings. This does the trick nicely! I love that I can update on the web or my iPod Touch & sync both with the touch of a button!

title: Patient
body: I do not have diabetes but it is in my family and I use it to "watch out". I love it! Doc does as well.

title: Easy to use
body: Easy to use.  This app has greatly assisted me with tracking my BG and diet.  It provides you with a detailed report  you can print off for your healthcare provider.

title: Has everything
body: This app is the easiest app to record blood sugar levels. I have no trouble recording/ reviewing my blood sugar level. Has everything You need.

title: Good for keeping a log... That's about it...
body: Good for keeping a log; synching does not work properly; not too user friendly - no help feature that I could find; plenty of sales pitch for related paid products; better than nothing but I'll still look further.

title: Very helpful
body: This is a great app and it has definitely helped me to track trends in my blood sugars.  My only complaint is that every entry automatically puts you at "out of bed" and it's confusing if you forget to change it. A great free app nonetheless.

title: Like it
body: It gives a somewhat easy format to forward to your drs. I would find it much more useful if there was a photo option to take a picture of your meal so that myself and my dr could check carb intake.

title: Best app ever!
body: This is an awesome app for diabetics! I love how I can chart my blood sugars. I also like that I can show it to my doctor or just take a pic & email it to her! If I could give this app more then 5 stars I would!

title: Very helpful app.
body: This allows me to greatly improve monitoring my glucose levels and improve control.

title: Works well
body: Operates without any crashes and allows me to enter the info I need to track. Gave 4 stars because the free version lacks useful features of the premium version. I use the note field to detail meals and activities.

title: Glucose Buddy
body: Like the app. Wish you could freetext times of day instead of just choosing "before breakfast, after lunch,  etc" also wish it would tell you the range of glucose levels for the times of day.

title: Better than expected
body: Really helps staying in top of your progress or lack of progress! Love it! Also share info with nurse and doc thru website!

title: Phenomenal
body: It's amazing and so easy to use with multiple pathways of access! I love that its website, app, and email oriented! Has improved the quality of my life many notches!!! So grateful!

title: Good app. Has a few kinks.
body: This app is great for tracking blood sugar levels. It's hard to read the levels with those colors against the background. Sometimes the logs will not sync. All things considered, it's still a good app.

title: Easy to use, Very helpful
body: I find this free app very easy to use. Also helpful as my doctor can just scan through the log results and review the graph.

title: Great tool to use!
body: Whether diabetes is new to you, or you've had it for years, this app helps you get the "big picture" and track your glucose trends.

title: Good App
body: Been using for a week and easy to use. Nice reports for tracking. Wish it had place for insulin tracking. But over all great product!!

title: Does What I need it to do
body: I ran out of log books and needed to record my readings. I haven't tried any other features yet but will update when I do

title: Common user
body: While I like the app, I can no longer email my numbers anymore.  Was a change made to this app? I click on email in app and it only takes me back to phone home screen.  I liked that feature.  Searching for a new app now.

title: Version 3.0
body: Version 2.1 was a GREAT app. Without the charting/graphing feature, this app is nothing more than a glorified notepad. PLEASE bring back the charting/graphing feature, and if necessary, I'd PAY for the app. The change from the scroll-wheels to the keypad entry is better, and the reminder alarms are a good feature, but not worth the sacrifice to me. The Testing In Pairs feature might be worthwhile to me over time, but I NEED the charting/graphing capability.

title: It's great!
body: I never leave home without my phone so i can track things much better and I use it with my "living strong" app to track my food.

title: Great tool.
body: Easy to use. The graph feature is very helpful and as someone else posted, it's very useful when going to see your doctor or dietician. I gave this app 4 stars instead of 5 because there isn't  an app for the iPad.

title: It's ok but has bugs
body: Won't log anything without taking glucose levels. Also would be great of the log could be copied and pasted into an email for my Doctor's secure web portal. Unable to email my Doctor the results, I have to read it off... Too time consuming..

title: This is great!!
body: I love this app! I check out other ones from time to time but keep coming back because of its many features and ease of use.

title: Glucose Buddy Rating
body: GB is very useful & easy to use. I especially enjoy the visualization of the chart showing gigs, lows, & averages each day of glucose readings. This helps me be more aware of spikes that are caused by my foolish choices. Thanks for a useful program. Jim D. San Antonio, TX
Great product that's easy to use. I'm keeping my logs accurately and timely. I would recommend this to all keeping track of your blood sugar levels.

title: Does a great job of keeping me on track.
body: This App does a great job of keeping me on track. My numbers have been climbing over time and I have them with me all the time.

title: Glucose buddy
body: I love this app! I can write my numbers down at any time and my doctor can see all numbers with each visit. Have told everyone about it!!!

title: Great App
body: This is a great App but I keep getting notifications that it needs updating-and no updates are available. How can this be done-I don't want to lose it?

title: Great!
body: This is a wonderful app. It really makes me pay more attention to my insulin and food intake. The graph also helps me have a better idea of what my A1C is going to be. Highly suggested for diabetics.

title: SWEET
body: I use this constantly and it does what it says. It is easy to sync- however I have learned to do so in afternoons and evenings- doesn't sync well in mornings. Easy workaround but needs to be addressed. Still the best. Love it!

title: Simply put - Perfect
body: This product delivers and then some. If you are serious about managing your diabetes, then you need this tool in your pocket to help you do it better.

title: It's great
body: It's the first app I open every morning. It's the best way to track my blood sugar numbers and being able to email the numbers to myself.

title: Extraordinary
body: I am a type 2 and this app has been very handy and simple in helping me keep track of my blood sugar level. It is effective and accurate. Excellent

title: Easy peasy!
body: I don't always have my log book but I'm always packin' my phone.  The entry and emailable graph work well, and the free backup to a web account is icing on the low carb cake.  I don't use the calorie counter.  But everything else works.

title: Very happy !
body: Great tool. The best part for me is that I can email logs to my healthcare practitioner. I ªd like GB to sync with other tools like FitBit and MyFitnessPal. The food section is the weakest aspect of this app. Otherwise, excellent with helping me track BG and insulin. MUCH easier than pen/paper tracking !

title: Glucose Buddy
body: I have found GB very useful, it tells me what I need quickly. The only I would change is making the graph easier to read. Thank you.

title: Meter app
body: Great app to track your blood sugar. I like that you can even copy the graph feature and that is included in the free version. You can email it to your doctor.

title: Does not support Cloud
body: It would be nice if you could synch all the data across different devices. I've contacted them to get support but they don't answer back. It has a "synch" button but it's not clear what it does.

title: Way better than handwritten logs!
body: Since I almost always have my phone with me, this app relieves me of the need to pack a logbook and pen with my test gear. It provides a quick overview of my recent blood sugar trends for important feedback for adjusting my lifestyle.

title: Child has T1D
body: This app has been a great app for our daughter who has T1D. We can track her blood sugar from different devices and easily send info to her endocrinologist. I do wish the food input was a little easier to use.

title: Good app
body: Very valuable in my diabetes control program. Share values with my physician which both of us like very much. Like the app very much. Very valuable in keeping up with diabetes control.

title: Great App!
body: I've been using this on my phone for about three years to track my blood sugar - its been easy and fast. Highly recommend!

title: Great App
body: Easy to use.  Graphs are much better than tracking on paper.  Wish it had integration with Run Tracker for exercise, and a better food tracking app.

title: Works for me
body: It logs what I need for now -- blood and meds. If I wanted to track carbs with prepopulated foods, I'd have to use another app. But it links to its sister apps like like the amazing pulse monitor which is smart stuff.

title: Apps
body: This is one of the best apps I have found. It tracks everything you need and is very easy to use. I recommend it to every one who is diabetic.

title: Biker Dude
body: This app makes if easier to store your info and then look at it over time to see how you're doing. My Doctor likes it and that's a plus!

title: Extremely helpful!
body: Having been diagnosed 2 years ago, this app has been my lifeline. It keeps me honest being able to see my trends.

title: Easy to use and helpful
body: The app is intuitive and simple to use. It's a great way to track your blood sugar. The graph is better than the one in the iPhone Health app.

title: Love this App!
body: As a newly diagnosed type1, I find this so helpful. When I am out and about it is so easy to log my BG numbers and the amount of insulin I take! I find the graphing helpful in tracking my highs and lows too.

title: I luv this app
body: I really luv this app, it is easy to use and and keep up w/ what you have going on. I really wish you could make a note w/o putting in a BG, because side notes are very needed w/ diabetes. :-)

title: Useful app
body: It is great to keep track of my blood levels & get an overall picture. Easy to use! However I don't quite understand the graph and wish I could set my own highs and lows for comparing my blood sugar.

title: Easy to use, nice graphics.
body: I am overall very pleased with this app. I would prefer if there was a bit more space to write in what I ate, to have a quick overview of what made sugars higher, but that is my wish list.

title: Great app
body: This app does everything I need it to do.  Tracks my BG, meds, activity, carbs as I enter them.  I am able to display the results in a graph, look at the logs or email them to my doctor.

title: Really helps
body: This app is really great. I am new to diabetes and was in over my head trying  to track my bg numbers. It is so easy here. Especially like the graphs to see how my condition is trending.

title: Great for tracking, server not so much
body: I really enjoy the interface for entering blood glucose tracking and ease of use but the server is very temperamental. At times, it refuses to update my entries and none of the updates have fixed or even improved this feature.

title: Great app if it doesn't keep crashing
body: I have been using the app about 2 years and it is great except almost once per two times I enter a value the app freezes and I kill the app then next time it crashes the third time works fine

title: Better than the apps you have to pay for
body: This app is so easy to use and has everything you need to keep track and share your BGL's with your doctor. I'm so glad I found this app!

title: Tremendously helpful!
body: Easy to use, more features than I even need. No excuses to not be up on checking a few times a day

title: Perfect
body: Love using this app to track my numbers. I especially like being able to email the data to turn in at my appointments!!!! Great app!

title: Like this app
body: Just started to use. Love its ease of use. Love the sites topics. Lots of advise. Just always ask doctor before trying some. To see if it works for your type of diabetes.

title: Good. Could be better.
body: For the most part works great   The food integration is a fail. all entries default to out of bed would like to see that fixed.  The bs an insulin part is good.  The website is good easy to use for gathering info for dr appointments.

title: Really great app!
body: I have found this app to be so helpful and easy to use while tracking my glucose levels every day. A must have for every diabetic.

title: Love this app!
body: I have impaired fasting glucose & my doctor has me testing when I don't feel good.  This app comes in very handy because my handwriting stinks!  I found nothing wrong with it...yet.

title: Very helpful
body: I like the way readings are displayed. It makes it easy for me to see how I'm doing, and when my doctor asks me "how are your bloods?" I whip out my iPhone and show him. It's an excellent mgmt tool.

title: Glucose Buddy
body: My teenage son has gone from checking an average of twice a day to an average of 10! This will definitely help him have better control!

title: Price
body: I upgraded to pro when it was advertised at 50% off. I was charged the full price by iTunes.  Is 6.99 the full price or the 50% off price?  Make sure you confirm the price before you buy!  I never heard back from glucose buddy when I emailed them for support.

title: Awesome
body: Great app easy to use keeps log on your phone when you don't have signal ad can then update online later.

title: Easy to use, visual and very convenient
body: Graph part shows your progress, and being able to have it online is useful. Great app.

title: Great but...
body: I love this app! I've been using it for two days and I love it. But...

title: Great app but needs some of Bloodwise features
body: I love this app but would really appreciate the statistics in Bloodwise - if only the two apps could be combined it would be awesome.  Also, would like to add in food choices but typing in is probably best solution.

title: GREAT TOOL!!! &  APP!!!
body: Very easy to use . Love the graphs and the logs. I use this app 3-4 times a day. It really helps keep my glucose numbers in range by the use of the graph. I look forward to seeing if my reading are staying in range.

title: Easy and simple
body: I'm a new diabetic and this makes keeping track so easy. I love the graph feature and enhanced options on their website.

title: Wp1997
body: I like this one better than the other one I have been using it is very straight forward and user friendly.

title: Very useful
body: Very useful to help me track both activity and blood levels. Syncs to main website well and like email function

title: Nice
body: Pretty easy to use

title: Great app but...
body: I love this app. It's easy to use however, my one complaint is the fact that my notifications don't work. I've got it set up to go off an hour after breakfast, lunch and dinner to check my BGL but it doesn't do it. Very disappointing. But I do still like the app.

title: Graphing is poor
body: I can enter data easily, but the graph function is terrible. It doesn't accurately graph my data - for example, it marked my low as being somewhere near zero, when in reality it was 86. Nothing I've do changes that glitch. Without the functioning graph, I cannot easily see a trend in my sugar levels. Boo.

title: Don't make me change!
body: I like this app but I keep getting messages it has to be updated to work with newest iOS so please keep it working!

title: Glucose Buddy Diabetic's tool
body: This smart phone and digital assistant application is not just a useful tool but a necessary tool integrated into a Diabetic's life. The access and tools available are key to my health management,

title: Much needed!
body: This is a neat app, but I wish it provided more details like the best range to be in. I would also like to sync it with my meter but it does not support this feature. Otherwise, I really like the graph to see where I'm headed.

title: Love it!
body: This app makes keeping track of my glucose a lot easier. When I go to the doctor all I do is open the app and hand him my phone.

title: Makes it easy
body: And even adds a challenge to tracking blood sugar levels. Can't live without it. Really!

title: Great
body: App works great, good way to keep up with  glucose levels.  Has note feature which allows you to add notes about levels, etc.

title: Almost perfect...
body: A few less steps, perhaps reminders, just little additions would make this app perfect. However, it is better than all others.

title: Very user friendly!
body: I looked at several apps and found this to be the most user friendly and inclusive.

title: Very useful tool and easy to use!
body: I was recently diagnosed with diabetes and this app is so much easier to use as a logging mechanism than my excel worksheet and sticky notes.

title: Looks Easy Enough
body: Entering data is straight forward and I look forward to seeing how easy a report will be

title: Very nice
body: I've been recording, and graphing my numbers on a spreadsheet, some fun.

title: Good app but crashes often.
body: Love the app!  Very useful in so many ways. The biggest problem is the crashing of the app. I would estimate it crashes about 30% of the time. That is too much.

title: Excellent
body: Glucose Buddy is very convenient.  It is extremely easy to use.  You simply enter your glucose reading, press upload, and the application organizes it very neatly.  I am very glad to be using it.

title: It's ok
body: Needs better graph, like averages of highs and lows the graph given is hard to read. Needs better support I've sent a few requests and no replies. Over all. It's pretty good but was chargEd twice to have it link my iPad and iPhone.

title: Best diabetes app so far...
body: I've installed everything I could find to help me track my blood sugar; from free to paid.  Nothing comes close to Glucose Buddy.  Meds, foods, activities... They're all here.

title: Awesome app!!
body: Still learning all the features but so far it has been a huge help and great for being able to send records to my doctor!!

title: Awesome app
body: Works great. I would never use a Pen and paper log, this keeps me on the ball. Haven't tried the food application. Won't allow me to put in the correct meter I use.

title: VERY USEFUL
body: I find this app a very useful replacement to paper logs.   I find the graphs a quick snap shot of my progress. The way I can email my log to my Doctor.  And finally the running averages to help keep me on target.  Very useful app, thank you.

title: Very easy to use
body: Other than a few fails when trying to sync it is easy to use.

title: A great app
body: The scale is great /  needs a food list for carbs amount for each serving to record how many carbs i had for each fruit, cereals, meats etc . It would help too  with my readings

title: Clear & Informative
body: This is a simple way to record your levels.  It's also great for reviewing levels over time.

title: Very easy to use and convienient
body: I test my sugar often and this app is a great way to see my progress. I love the graph!! I recommend it to anyone who keeps track of their blood sugar.

title: Fantastic Application!
body: I really like this app and it's FREE. I have only had it for 4 days and it's amazing. I successfully e-mailed it to myself and brought it to my doctor. He was impressed. Great product. Kudos to the developer(s). GET IT, USE IT, LOVE IT!

title: One of THE best diabetes apps out there!
body: Very easy to use and is fully functional from the min you enter your first reading! Ability to e-mail yourself or your Dr. your results.

title: Very helpful
body: By requiring me to manually input my readings it helps me to remember to take them. My only complaint is in the graphing, it only tracks daily highs, lows and averages. A single line graph showing readings over time would be a nice addition.

title: Quick, Efficient, Easy to Use...What an App Should Be!
body: Great app! I have used a couple other glucose trackers, but this one is the easiest to use...and has never crashed (not so with others)! Data export (Excel, Numbers) would be very welcome.

title: Great App
body: This is a great app when working with a doctor.  I can upload and print a report for my doctor. I haven't used it for anything but blood sugar but it is perfect for me.

title: A great resource
body: Makes tracking glucose levels easy, and sending the logs to my doctor by email cuts down on the number of visits that I need to make.

title: Great
body: This is the best way I can keep tract of my blood levels and I can chart it and just pull it up when I see my doctor and show her. It's amazing.

title: Functional
body: For the most part I find this app functional but not so intuitive as it could be. For example, when adding your meds you have to take too many steps to enter them in the app

title: Needs updating. Won't work on next IOS update
body: Well planned, very useful and easy to use. However, it has been so long since it has been updated the app slows your machine down, doesn't integrate with other health apps and it won't be supported and won't work in the next IOS update. The developers need to get this updated  or watch it crash and burn.

title: Great and easy app
body: This is a great app and anyone with diabetes should have. It easy makes it easy for my physician to see results on everything...keep it up

title: Almost there
body: I do really like this app, it's easy to use and doesn't try to make things too "fancy".  I wish I could figure out how to add distance instead of time for the activity tracker.

title: Okay app
body: Keeps track nicely but the emailed report could be better. Would be nice if each day could be on same line.

title: Easy to use
body: Reading the logs would be easier if you could group them by time of day. But love how easy it is to use and sync and print off the numbers.

title: Does exactly what I need
body: Great app that does exactly what it says it does. Perfect way to keep track of a lot of what is going on with your body day to day. A great step towards a healthier you.

title: No Support
body: App won't accept my log-in under "setting". Therefore I can't sync my entries! I've uninstalled & reinstalled this app twice now due to the same problem. Have tried to contact customer support but find it to be non existence. Why would I upgrade an app that has no support?

title: Awesome!!!!!!!!!
body: I have tried at least 4 other apps on recording my sugar levels. By far this is the best. It is simple to use and easy to read! Thanks

title: Love!
body: Love this app! The only thing I dislike is if I don't pause & go ahead to enter today's readings, then tomorrow I can't enter. I love everything else about the app! And learning more from other diabetics on the forum is very useful.

title: Review
body: It's been quite helpful in tracking my sugar levels. If your a visual type person the graphing function helps you see your levels for several test cycles.

title: New to diabetes
body: So far it has helped me track my readings and easily enter it on my iPhone. I'm learning how to use the app so I don't have any complaints as of yet.

title: Nice application...
body: I have been using this application for about 2 weeks and enjoying it. I find it user friendly. Support was fast and helpful. Thanks for helping me start to head in the right direction.

title: Graphs are back!!!
body: Now that the graphs are back this is easly a five star app! I highly recommend this app to any fellow diabetic! And what is even great is it is free! Even if it wasn't I would happly pay for it!

title: Do not update this app- adds ads only
body: I loved this app, gave it 5 stars, until I updated it today  and ended up with ads that I can't get rid of.  I see no improvement in the app -- just the addition of ads.  I'm not happy, and would gladly undo the update if I could.

title: Best yet!
body: I have type 2 and was recently released from the hospital on insulin. And this helps me keep track and also gives an average plus it uploads all my logs to the site securely. LOVE IT!

title: Structured
body: The graphing option give a visual representation of where my levels have been. This tends to keep me closer to being on track with my goals.

title: Very helpful app.
body: This is wonderful for anyone who is a diabetic or is in danger of becoming one.  The graph charting the blood sugar levels could be better, but other than that this is a wonderful app.

title: Had the app for 5 mins and first issue
body: Tried setting my primary meter to Bayer Contour, but the app keeps flipping back to Bayer Breeze 2 for some reason...it will not stay where I set it. So far everything else looks good.

title: Best glucose tracker
body: This is the best glucose tracker I've found. It is precise and easy to use. It gives you a true picture of where your numbers are. I love it!!!  Been using it for 3 years and am impressed with the improvements.

title: Thank you for this app !
body: I was just recently diagnosed with type 2 diabetes . This app has really helped me to keep up with the monitoring of my sugar levels .

title: It's easy and convenient.
body: I use my iPod touch constantly so as a newly diagnosed diabetic I love being able to log my blood sugars daily and see on the graph that I'm in the "good zone"! It really helps when I go to my Dr's appt. to show him how I'm doing.

title: Easy to use
body: I've found this very easy to use, which is important, since I'm lazy enough about checking my BG levels as it is.

title: Great, but room to improve
body: Love the log and easy to use interface. The graph is nice but older eyes need to be able to zoom in to see details. The food CT integration app keeps closing. I wish it were all in one.

title: Great App
body: Helps me manage my daughters T1D. Found it in the App Store the day she was diagnosed and it us a great tool to track everything and have all information at my fingertips.

title: Great!!!
body: Quick and easy, Great way to keep track of everything in 1 app! Have been using for over a year!! Still the best I have used!

title: Good app
body: I like the app, I just think it would be helpful if the log could be changed to show in the other order so I don't have to read my numbers in reverse order.

title: Great app!
body: This app is easy to use and allows me to share my data w my Dr timely and efficient w the ability to download results directly to email!!

title: Like it
body: I like it so far. I've had other glucose tracker apps that were annoying to use and so far this one is pretty easy.

title: Better control
body: This app enables me to keep track of my blood sugars without having to find a pen and a log book. Easily shows trends and makeshift mindful oft sugar levels. My doctor really appreciates it also!

title: Easy to enter glucose readings
body: If you are looking for a quick and easy way to enter and track glucose readings, this app works great. i have not utilized the desk top synced program yet.

title: Great app
body: Come on who now a days don't always have a phone with them. No excuses to not keep track of sugars. Wonderful app, very user friendly, easy to review with drs! Would share this app w anyone being a diabetic. :)

title: Meets all my needs
body: I get to review when, and if I took my meds and I can show my doctor a fairly accurate chart and A1C. Been using it about one year.

title: Great!
body: I'm a Type II Diabetic x 1 year, also a Registered Nurse... I'd highly recommend this to anyone needing to watch their blood glucose levels!  It's a great way to help your Dr see a history of your glucose in one touch!

title: Great App
body: Works well; I use the app to track changes to my blood sugar and A1C levels. I can also give this info to my doctor, which is really helpful.

title: Fantastic app
body: Very intuitive and useful app. Would be helpful if it had the ability to download glucose levels to an email. Overall great app.

title: Love it
body: The app is great! I do have a small problem. When registering I entered the wrong email address and it won't let me fix it. So I can't use the forums or sync the app :(

title: Glucose Buddy keeps me aware.
body: I can think of a few improvements, but not many. I like the graphing and reporting. It has much better memory than me.

title: The Buddy
body: I like the portability, since it is part of my phone I have it with me for recording when i'm away from home. The graph is great for me and to show my Dr. It is simple to use. You can fill in unrecorded meter readings from meter memory.

title: Just what I need!
body: I had fallen into a dangerous pattern of not even checking my BG levels, much less keeping any journals. Adding this free app has set me back on track. Wonderful app!

title: Richard
body: The app is the best app I have found to help me manage my diabetes. I wish the app was as helpful with my diet. I am not sure if it is I or the app that does not know how to track my diet with this one app. I now have to use another app for my diet.

title: Great app for newly diagnosed diabetic
body: New to daily monitoring, but thought to check for an app.  Found this, and for my record keeping needs, it's easy and always at hand.

title: Thank U
body: Simple easy to use app that is way better than any computer software I've used 2 do the same thing. Worth 5 stars.

title: Give me back the old version with charts
body: You have given much more flexibility but the application is more confusing to operate if all one wants is the log and the graph. Where are the charts? I would have graded you 5 stars with the old app', but only two with the new app'. Whose idea was it to eliminate the graph? Please bring it back.

title: Diabetics management made easy
body: I've been using this app for at least 4 years. It covers all the bases in an easy and intuitive format.

title: Glucose Buddy
body: Very easy to keep track and you can focus where you might be having issues

title: Love it!
body: I've never been good at keeping a log book and this app makes it so simple! Easy to use and for my doctor to view. Thanks!

title: Activity log
body: Activity log in the pro version does not show a choice of activities or have have a way to enter time used for activity. Disappointing!

title: My Pal Glucose Buddy
body: Really convenient and easy to use. I always have my phone with me to enter test readings or to show my doctor. No paper logs for me! However, cannot get the photo option to work.

title: Gestational diabetes
body: I use this to record my glucose checks and it is so easy and convenient.  Much better than keeping a notebook on hand.

title: Great App
body: Easy way to track carbs, activity, and blood glucose. I use it all day, every day to get a grip on my blood sugar levels. Do check out the forum to learn how to use it.

title: GB Review
body: This tool works great for tracking the things I need. It does have issues with syncing up with the GB web sight. This portion could be improved otherwise it's great. I love graph and the ability to take notes.

title: RN
body: Great app! Easy to use. Especially like the  ability to write comments while recording readings. Creates easy to read chart to show or email your physician.

title: My Doctor Impressed!
body: Doctor liked the graph. The log needs to fill out the page width.  Wasted to many pages when I printed it.

title: New to this!
body: I recently started using this ap to keep track of all my bs readings and I love the fact that you get your bs average right away.  I even have my kids using it.  Thank to the creator of this application.

title: Very convenient
body: Easy to read and understand except for food log which needs rethinking

title: Just what we needed!
body: Syncs between multiple devices!  Perfect way for multiple care givers to be on the same page.

title: Glucose buddy's
body: It works, easily and simply. Puts all your diabetes information in a easy format to give your doctor. Highly recommend..

title: Glucose Buddy
body: This is an excellent app to monitor your diabetes. I use it to record my sugar levels, blood pressure, exercise (under activity) and my weight. I just started recording my carb intake under Food. It has really helped me stay on target. :-)

title: Wonderful app!
body: So easy to use and so much easier to keep track of the record because it's in my phone

title: Retired
body: Quick and easy way to track your daily glucose levels.

title: Excellent program
body: This is a great program to track your diabetes. I would recommend it to anyone doing testing on regular basis. Has been a great help

title: Very useful
body: Good app. It's motivating to track progress.

title: Great app
body: I find this app to be both helpful and easy to use. The addition of the forum puts me in touch with others. Highly recommend it!

title: If your a diabetic you should have this
body: This is a great app to have if your a diabetic. This helps track your condition and log it for your doctor to see.

title: I feel misled!
body: While GB is Fantastic, I feel very misled about their recent integration with Calorie Track.

title: LOVE IT!!!!
body: I love this app I always tried to keep log books and always failed this is sooo much more convenient and works perfectly for teens as well

title: Gestational wonder
body: I used this app all through my gestational diabetes. The only thing I didn't like was that you had to erase every entry individually. I ended up erasing the app and then re-downloading it every two weeks.

title: Super user friendly!
body: So easy to use and you can back date it of you didn't have time to document your BG or food you at! I love it!

title: Keeps me on track!
body: Great app that keeps me on track day to day! It has great functionality! To be able to see the graph gives great insight into makings meal corrections! Thanks!

title: Skya
body: I love this app, so easy to use and very fast to input readings. The app averages out all your readings and even has a graph on how well you keep within the guidelines of blood sugar.

title: What a disaster of an update!
body: Your new log system is a failure! I used to see glucose reading, before or after what meal, and any notes such a insulin dose age. Now all I see in the log is the blood sugar reading and time. You took a great app that I used for over 15 years and ruined it!

title: Great app
body: I've been using for a year, love the quick sync and graphing. Probably the most important and most used app on my phone

title: Great App
body: Love this app. Keeps good track of the results and if I forget to input the information, the app allows me to put the correct time and date.

title: Pretty good app
body: This is a pretty good app for keeping track of your levels. Wish there was a way to send the entire graph to an email or a pic of the whole graph. Not just a small pic of a few days.

title: Gb
body: I use it every time I take my blood sugars it is easier then keeping track in a book plus it gives me a chart.

title: User
body: So easy to use and I'm able to put in all the info I need for each log. Perfect for tracking!

title: Great tool for managing diabetes
body: This app is incredibly helpful for managing my diabetes. It helps me by showing me exactly what's going on with my BG and it makes it easy to share with my doctor.

title: Blood Glucose
body: Great App! It keeps all my information in one place. I do wish there was a database for recording food and activities. Over all I really love the app.

title: Server often too busy.
body: Have been using GB Pro for glucose, bp, and weight entries. First, the graphs for glucose are helpful, but the bp and weight graphs are useless. Second, the app closes out when I try to edit bp entries. Third, the server is often too busy. Really???

title: Not bad but...
body: I'm testing this app out to see how you compare to log frog. You need to allow two places after the decimal for logging insulin. Pump users can take hundredths of a unit but your system only allows tenths to be put in. Frustrating.

title: Diabetis app
body: Great app for tracking ur sugar levels.  My husband is a bad diabetic and after this last heart attack he is getting better with his tracking and his shots.  His Dr likes it to.

title: Extremeful helpful application
body: Has greatly improved my ability to notice patterns in glucose levels.  The endocrinologist liked the added detail compared to reviewing the glucose meter.

title: Love this app!!!
body: This makes tracking by blood sugars easy and fun.  I love the graph feature, and the selection of things to track (sugars, activity, food, etc)

title: Good app
body: Had problems logging into forum that no one could seem to help me with. Still cant log in even though the help line said they would try to fix. Outside of that it's a good useful app.

title: Awesome-thank you!
body: Very helpful for record keeping and get to use my iPhone so portable and private. Let's you see the truth objectively. I highly recommend!

title: Fantastic app
body: This has really helped me understand my numbers better and get them under control!

title: User
body: App works great I just wish it had an easier way to import lots of data manually because my meter doesn't have a way to interface with the App.  But a nice app nonetheless.

title: Great app
body: This app is a no brainer if you want to stay in control of your diabetes! Best feature is you can email your doctor your daily readings prior to your visit!

title: 1 Year Anniversary
body: I've used GB for a year now, still as handy as the day I downloaded it.  Even lost my iPhone and sine records are uploaded, I lost no data.  Handy for tracking A1C too!

title: Format
body: does almost everything

title: Just okay not great
body: This is still a good app but personally I miss the graph that gave a quick status over several days.

title: Could be better if.....
body: This app would be perfect if the meal tracker worked. I'm using 2 apps and would love to have it bundled into one. Also when I update stuff on the web I would like to be able to sync it to my phone.

title: Type 2
body: Easy to use log with simple upload sync. Reminder alarms not currently functional but iPhone alarms can do that job. Overall, a worthwhile app for daily glucose management.

title: Works well
body: Easy to use and much better at keeping a detail record. Easy to review with doctor

title: Great application for diabetes
body: This application enables me to keep

title: A "must have" for diabetics
body: Glucose Buddy is very easy to use and allows me to stay on top of my blood glucose levels. I use it every day and can e-mail logs to my doctor.

title: Just what I needed!
body: Easy to use, keeps all my info available for me and the Doc at all times. The simpler to use, the better for me!

title: Pretty cool!
body: Having the info on my phone is easier than having to write it down every time I test

title: FANTASTIC!
body: I've only been type 1 for 4 months, and I've been using this ever since. It's great! Very easy to use. The graph is nice, and the online a1c calculator is pretty accurate.

title: Easy to use!
body: I use this daily to keep track of my levels. I don't even write down in my log anymore! When I go to my Dr. appointments I can just pull up on my phone my results. It's nice!!

title: A Valuable Diabetic Tool
body: A must have for a diabetic!  I can keep up with my blood levels and see how they change with food or my meds.  Love the app!
Great! The only thing I would change is the way the options auto-reset when you log medicine, bg, etc. all at the same time. Otherwise, very helpful!

title: User
body: Excellent well-designed app to keep track of glucose and meds. My doctor lives that I can come in with such detailed info

title: Great App
body: Very user friendly. Makes keeping a record of blood glucose testing a simple task. I find I'm testing more frequently since getting this app.

title: Excellent
body: I just found out I am diabetic.  I am very busy with a career and more importantly my family.  We are on the goal a lot so this app is perfect for my lifestyle.  Thank you

title: Efficient!
body: This app is great for quick documenting of glucose readings.  Haven't used the other features yet but just what I needed for quickly recording readings!

title: Very useful
body: Have used daily for several years to track BG, exercise and weight. I like that it syncs across multiple devices and computers. Extreme helpful.

title: CdubluesSmith
body: Very easy to use, convenient and provides quick access to BG level history to review with your doctors to note BG managment and stability.

title: Simple function
body: Easy to use, easy to customize to your own needs.

title: Great app
body: Easy to use. Website very useful. wish all info was in App. Instead of website though.

title: Great app
body: It is awesome to have a traveling log of my blood sugars that goes with me everywhere I go. Easy for my doctor to see what my levels are doing.

title: Glucose Buddy, the best!
body: I was curious and doubtful about this program, but it made me a believer. I used to keep track in endless booklets, but now I do everything on my iPad & computer.

title: Almost perfect
body: Love the program. Fast entry. I just wish I could find a way to have the log put my BG's in categories for the doctor to compare all breakfast #'s,etc. Maybe, I'm just missing it?

title: Difficult for Diabetes team assessment.
body: The general idea of this program is great.  However,  when printing out the results they are very difficult to assess at a glance what patterns are emerging on a daily basis.  The long tedious list is time consuming to study and needs to be re-written onto another form.  Very disappointing.

title: Great app
body: The app is great. When you keep it updated with your blood sugars and you go to their website the A1C calculator is very close to what the doctor gets

title: Great
body: This is one of the better apps I have used. Has all the features I am looking for as a Type 1 diabetic.

title: Great app
body: Very helpful for tracking bg, charts are helpful too. Notes portion allows you to keep track of what you ate

title: Few issues but overall good
body: I wish it didn't break the insulin up from the glucose. I would like to see it all in one screen. Otherwise seems ok

title: Thank you
body: I was just recently diagnosed with diabetes, and I just want to say 'thank you' for your help in learning to track and manage my blood sugar.

title: A truly great product
body: I can show my doc my progress and even show printouts of my BP and glucose along with notes.  It works and keeps me healthy!

title: Mr
body: Use this tool to assist in moving your health in a positive direction. Knowledge is power. The recorded information should be shared with your doctor. Keep your BS low, exercise & live a long & happy life. EAT WELL!

title: Would give 5 stars if...
body: Very buggy. Crashes often. Won't save food selection from list - stays stuck on one selection after a few entries. Very frustrating on an otherwise awesome app.

title: Great app
body: This is a great app. I like the graphs. It helps me identify trends very easily. Much better than the app that came with my glucometer. Very easy to record readings and I also like that it records weight and pulse.

title: EASY
body: It's much easier to keep track of my BG this way .It comes with my just like my glucometer and when I test my BG i put it in the ipod along with my medicine. I have to send reports in every week. It makes it easy to email them to your doctor from your ipod.

title: Glucose buddy
body: I've used this app for a month and it's a great aid in trending blood sugar.  The link with a web page is very helpful.  I use it in conjuction with Sparkpeople to manage weight-diet- fitness and blood sugar.  I highly recommend it.

title: useful app
body: Very simple and useful app. I really like this app and it's FREE. I have only had it for 4 days and it's amazing. I successfully e-mailed it to myself and brought it to my doctor.

title: Perfect for now
body: I have had no issues, and find it essential to my current Type 1.5 management

title: Simple to use great app
body: Just start the app and plug in the meter reading. It does not get much simpler than that. I like the capture button for the graph. Makes an nice image for emailing or printing.

title: Easy to use App
body: Just started using the app and I can see that it will work well when I visit my physician. He'll be able to just scroll to view the logs.

title: Very good
body: I just needed something practical to write down my sugar levels.... It's awesome, I enter the numbers, it send to my email and I print it. Just love it

title: My Doc loves the log
body: This is handy especially for me, was just diagnosed and still trying to figure out what is good and what not so much

title: Very handy
body: When you can monitor your glucose level on a whim and sync it to your record in the cloud, you feel good! This is what GB does! Very satisfied with it!

title: Excellent APP (v3.7.0)
body: Been using this app for close to 2years now and haven't experienced any probs. This app is useful for documentation for my Doc during my yearly check up.

title: Love the App
body: I am pre-diabetic and record my blood sugar.  The App has really helped to keep awareness high of the BG level and impact of eating right and exercise.

title: Drops of wisdom
body: This app does what you need it to do. It has replaced my pencil & paper and gives me a chart list as well as a colorful graph - who knew testing could be fun!

title: Great App!
body: Very user friendly and easy to read.  My doctor was very impressed with the graph.  Been using it for over a year and I am very pleased with it!!

title: New to tracking
body: I like the convenience of tracking on my phone and seeing the trends graph. Having a hard time figuring out some of the optional tracking tools.

title: Nice App
body: This app is easy to use and it helps me keep track of my readings. It provides me with an average of my measurements which become handy for monitoring purpose.

title: Nice tool
body: I like this tool easy to use and gives me my average.  Much easier than tracking on paper.

title: It works
body: I like the fact that I can sync with my iPad and my phone and computer that is very helpful.

title: Good App
body: A simple and easy-to-use free app.  It occasionally has problems syncing, but it doesn't happen often and it was fixed pretty quick.

title: So easy to use
body: I can add in information on the meds I'm taking, the exercising I'm doing, the food I'm eating as well as the blood sugar numbers. Everything my doctor wants to see in one place.

title: Love it ... BUT
body: I paid to turn off the resource hogging push advertisements, but they came back! Let me spend a few dollars more to turn them off?  I think not.

title: Great app
body: This is a great app. I love the ability to sync my readibgs. I print them out and give them to my doctor at my appointments and he thinks tha is very useful.

title: Has helped me to monitor my condition!
body: Recently diagnosed w/ Type II, this app makes it easy for me to monitor and control by BG Level! Highly recommend it for anyone in need of such an app.

title: Basic Stuff
body: Gives you the ability to track your blood sugar. Would rate higher if items included would work without having to pay

title: Very Helpful
body: I was just diagnosed with gestational diabetes and this app has really helped me stay organized keeping track of my levels.

title: Awesome!
body: Find a way to integrate with My Fitness Pay and Jog Log so I can scan foods and transfer workouts and and i would pay $20 bucks for the combo.

title: Glucose Buddy
body: I like this app very much. The only thing I would prefer is I would like it to automatically separate the records by each day.

title: Handy
body: App works well. I love that you can log other health stats--weight,BP, &more-- right in same app. Also lets you add notes to entries. Highly recommended.

title: Good App
body: If you decide to track food, have to be patient with initial input and selecting food. But once you have the foods you generally eat set up, works great

title: Love it!
body: I love this app! I think it Is wonderful because I can see what my levels were at weeks ago and see the graphs of how my levels change throughout the day.

title: Simplicity itself
body: So thrilled to have found this app, after being faced with managing my newly diagnosed condition. Simple, easy-to-use and includes full MS Excel integration. Makes life simple!!!

title: Excellent
body: Your Glucose Buddy is a great tool to build compliance for diabetic treatment.  That should build a healthier patient and improve quality of life.  Would like to contact the developer.

title: Nice app
body: I was surprised how easy to use. It does what it says and a lot more. Been using it for a week and a lot easier than little notes here and there. Very good for the price!

title: Good App... Bad Marketing!
body: I love this app. Easy to track my BG and I love the graft feature. I can't wait to show it to my doctor at my next appointment.

title: Glucose monitor
body: Really helps me keep track. I would recommend to anyone watching their levels.

title: Easy to Use
body: This app is easy to navigate and great to log information. I really like that you can add notes

title: Abandoned app?????
body: This app appears to have been abandoned by the developer.

title: Literally a lifesaver!
body: Was diagnosed with type 2 a week ago and I feel empowered with this app to take control of the process to reverse it!

title: Awesome
body: Absolutely awesome app and I don't generally at that about the vast majority of apps.  So easy to use allowing me to enter everything I want in information. Great job devs!

title: Great iPhone app, needs an iPad version.
body: I gave it 4 stars because it needs a better way to send data and an iPad app. Having said that, it's a terrific app and will get 5 stars the moment there is an iPad version.

title: Fast and Easy
body: This app makes it easy to track my glucose and easy to share my results with doctor.

title: Awesome app for diabetics
body: Easy to use and I have my phone with me all the time and can show my doctor anytime he needs it. Or if in hospital all of a sudden now they k ow my records

title: Sweet but Straight
body: This is one " Sweet" app. I use this to keep my blood sugar straight. I combine this with the heart rate app and a foot nutrition app and I can completely control my day easily. This is the best BG = Blood Sugar app around.

title: Great app
body: Very helpful in control of diabetes

title: Great
body: This app has been able to keep me in check as I manage my blood sugar. This is a must have program.

title: Easy
body: It's very easy and convenient to use! Now I just take my phone with me to the doctor and not my monitor or paper. It's very convenient

title: Wonderful
body: Love this app. Only problem I have is not able to print my records for my doctor. Great for keeping up with my glucose.

title: Better than paper and pen
body: A lot easier for tracking than trying to write in little boxes in a small book. The forum is a great resource, too.

title: Excellent App for glucose control
body: Over 2 years now. Maps all trends to help you understand what works and what doesn't !

Best thing ever I've had diabetes for 6 years and this is the best thing I've ever tried I allready noticed a difference in my bg !!!!!! I would also recimend getting the gomeals app really helpfull :)

title: Nice app
body: Nice app.   Has helped me keep track and control my t2

title: Useful
body: Although this app is slower and more cumbersome than a couple others that also track glucose, insulin, exercise, etc., the ability to sync with the website is a plus.

title: Best glucose log book ever!
body: Easy to use. Great report generator. Easy to share with my doctor. Takes all the work out if keeping a log.

title: GB tracking
body: This has been a great program not only for myself but for my doctor. He already knows my chart before I even see him. Love it  MP

title: Awesome!
body: Great way to keep track of my numbers, as well as when I took what medication and how much was taken...all in one single app.

title: Glucos Buddy
body: What else can you ask keeps a log and shows you a chart. That's all I need instead of writing it on a paper.

title: Great Tool!
body: Makes my diabetes easier to manage. Also being able to email my results to my advisor is awesome too!

title: Great app!
body: Easy to use. It's been so easy for me to keep track and I am really bad at it usually. I have a doctors appt soon and can't wait to show him!

title: Newbie
body: I was devestated by my diagnosis 10 days ago. My doc gave me so little info. But this app has given me a sense of order in what seems so chaotic right now. Thanks!

title: This app is so good
body: I am 15 and this app is has helped me out alot i just put in my blood sugars and email them toy doctor it is so user friendly

title: Great App
body: Coming from a blackberry with a less than working app, this is way better with more options! Great job!

title: Better than handwriting
body: I had to handwrite my log for years now it is easier than testing my blood. Great app!!

title: Helpful
body: This program helps bring peace of mind to my daughter's assist with new affliction and good communication between myself and the school. Thank you!!!!

title: Won't upload, worthless app!!!
body: This was a good app until you try to upload all your data. I wrote support and still didn't get a response. Now I have to manually upload them so my doctors office can see my results to make changes to my pump. Don't waste your money on the pro version cause it's crap. Time to find a new app!

title: Most used free app
body: Great for free app. Easy to provide numbers to doctor.

title: Good app
body: I have enjoyed logging my blood glucose levels using this app. I have had trouble being consistent, and having the log readily available has really helped me.

title: Excellent app for tracking blood sugar levels
body: Much more convenient than keeping a little diary

title: Great BGL tracker!!
body: Very easy to use! Awesome sync to their website feature makes it easy to print and email! I recommend!

title: Thankful
body: Without GO I would not have been able to keep track of my blood sugars and insulin doses while I was pregnant!!

title: Solid & Simple
body: The GB apps is a very easy way to record, sync, print, and graph your readings.  Could use a little more customizability in graphing view - but well worth it.  I highly recommend it.

title: Good but not great
body: As a logbook, it's as good as paper and pencil but more convenient.

title: Good app for diabetics!!!
body: Great app for keeping track of glucose levels, everything syncs to a full website where you can print out charts/graphs showing the levels you've recorded...

title: Fabulous
body: This has become an integral part of my diabetes control. I open this app before I even open my glucose testing kit.

title: Great app
body: App has been very handy to keep track of glucose levels. Is great to have on your iPhone to have with you all the time.

title: Lacks essentials
body: While this app allows tracking of everything I was looking for... They forgot to put in push reminders. When I log in food it should ping me 2 hours later so I can check my BG. If that feature is here... I can't find it. Will be continuing my hunt for the perfect app...

title: Glucose Buddy
body: Works great for what I need!  Record sugar and meds and have reports to give my doctor on a monthly basis. Syncs between iPhone and iPad. Sure beats keeping a log. Web site does not work well but app works great

title: Love it!!!
body: It's simple to use and one can put just sugar info or can be a little more elaborate. Out of all the diabetic apps I've tried this is the best

title: Glucose Buddy
body: This has been such a valuable tool to keep track of my blood glucose levels, I don't ever want to be without it. Thank You

title: Great App
body: This app is really easy to use. I love the fact I don't have to keep a handwritten log and can look at quick graph on how I'm doing!

title: Suggestion to make it a 5
body: If you could import information from my tester(pump) to this program so I could see it would make it incredible.

title: Great info for my doctor
body: This app let's me show my doctor the history of my blood readings instead of handing him a sheet of paper. A great tool for all to use.

title: I use it everyday. Great app
body: I'm on insulin so I check my blood sugar 4-5 times per day. Easy to use. I sync my results to the Glucose Buddy website and it is easy to export to Excel.

title: Easy to use
body: My doctor is thrilled with me using this app for tracking. I just take in my phone and she can quickly scan my numbers.

title: Better than log books
body: Easy to use

title: Great app!
body: I've used this app for a little more than a year now, it is an excellent tool for any diabetic.  Highly recommend.

title: GREAT APP!!
body: I'm so happy I found this app. My Dr wants me to keep my BG under 120 and this app is great for tracking it. Not only that, I export the data with graph into Excel and bring a copy for the Dr to see and add to my records.

title: Quick, easy and a breeze
body: This app is easy to use, full of information and extremely helpful.

title: Very convenient!
body: Makes it easy to keep a record of your sugar levels

title: Use of glucose buddy
body: It helps me keep my numbers ready for doctors appointments. Easy in figuring out averages with graph. One criticism, program uses a lot of juice on phone.

title: Good App
body: Easy to use app for adding logs. One suggestion - ability to graph by entry type (before meals, after meals, etc). Otherwise I would've given 5 stars instead of 4 1/2

title: Reliable and easy
body: I use this to track my levels only since I have gestational diabetes and don't need insulin right now. I use notes line to record what I eat.

title: Love it.
body: Easy to use.  Charts are useful to take to Dr.  Like using various devices for input and have all my data on the website.

title: Test engineer
body: I depend on this app instead of a log book. My doctor loves this app too especially the graph that plots the highs lows and average. Been a great help to me in managing my glucose levels.

title: Love this app!!
body: This is so much easier to record BG and    Meds than my old logbook plus the Dr can read it and make proper insulin adjustments, unlike my sloppy writing!

title: Love it!
body: My child was just diagnosed last month. Follow up care is two hours away and always wants our logs. I LOVE using this app to quickly add in his BG #s and see the patterns on the graph. Keep up the good work!

title: Could be better
body: I am only interested in glucose log. it does the job but graphs of results could be much better. Pushing the expensive optional features is a minus

title: Love this app
body: This is a great app.  I told my doctor about it and she was really impressed it was helping me be more mindful of how what I eat effects my glucose levels.

title: Great app
body: One feature that would be cool is an instant timer that would set for 2 hours after you enter in a meal you ate to remind you to check your blood sugar.

title: Love this app!
body: This makes tracking blood sugar quick and easy. Graphs give you great visualization of how well you are controlling your blood sugars,

title: Good but please add...
body: I love this app but I'd like to see the ability to view glucose level by time of day so I can adjust my pump accordingly. Also, please decrease the minimum value for glucose to 20. I am frequently in my 30s! Make these changes and it would be perfect!

title: Glucose buddy
body: It is a wonderful product. I used it a couple of days ago and emailed my stats to my doctor. I highly recommend it.

title: Great app!
body: I use this everyday to help motivate me to stay healthier. My Dr. Loves it as well. I can now have answers to his questions about my progress at a seconds notice.

title: Neat app!
body: App is actually a bit more user-friendly than the website. They sync beautifully.

title: So easy!
body: It's easy and exactly what I was looking for. Just wish it could magically link directly to my glucometer. Otherwise perfect.

title: Time saver
body: Saves time. All I have to do is take my bg level and log it. Easy to use especially when out camping or doing scouting activities with my son and his friends.

title: Great app!
body: I use this everyday. My doctor is impressed by the data I collect for my blood sugar, blood pressure and weight. One of the most useful apps I have.

title: AWESOME
body: As a newly diagnosed diabetic, this is a perfect tool. Super easy to use and track sugar levels. Allows me to email my Dr. recorded blood sugar levels so he can adjust meds accordingly. Thank you!!!

title: Love it!
body: I find this app easy to use!  It's an invaluable tool in my diabetes lifestyle. The only problem is when I switch phones data does not carry over.

title: Makes journaling a breeze
body: What makes this a winner?

title: Good app
body: Love the app. Easy for me to track and diagnose trends. Having a backup on the web was handy when my phone crashed.

title: Great tool!
body: I used to keep track of all my blood glucose, BP, weight, etc., on a spread sheet .  This is much more convenient.  Wish it could take the reading directly from my OneTouch Ultra, but that's a meter issue.

title: Wow
body: This app is much better than a paper record!  I always have my phone so I'll always have my glucose and medical logs.

title: Handy
body: Good app for recording sugars anywhere. Handy for printing them out before a doctor's appointment. Have had trouble syncing-a lot of times it will say it cannot contact the server.

title: Great For keeping me on track
body: Great app for keeping me on track. I'm able to write everything down in one place without the traditional log book.

title: Sugar
body: It feels like you have to go through a maze to get where you want too. Too many hoops and oops. I give it half a star.

title: Convenient & pretty much intuitive
body: I haven't used all the capabilities yet, but it does what I ask without complication

title: Very helpful
body: This is one of the most useful apps on my phone, by far. It's so nice to be in the doctor's office and have all my numbers handy, without fumbling with (or remembering to bring) a notebook.

title: Thank you...
body: Makes emailing my DR so much easy then calling in numbers. Also love the graphs and seeing how I'm managing my diabetes. Been a true wonder of a help.

title: Tracking & reporting
body: This is a good way for me to email my reports to my healthcare professionals, however I recently lost all data on my phone and cannot retrieve my old logs.

title: One of the few apps I use every day!
body: This app could change your life. Best way to track you sugars in a fun, easy way.

title: Solid app..
body: Works for me..  Syncing feature is nice if ya dont mind paying for the it. :((

title: Good. Not perfect
body: It does a lot of things well. I wish it would assume that the injection and blood test were at the event like "before lunch". But that's a nitpick. Graphing seems a bit less useful too.

title: I like the app
body: The GB is great. Helps me manage my diabetic life. The calorie counter is worthless. Wish I had my money back since I had to delete it. I guess it's like everything else, it's a money thang.

title: Great app but could be awesome
body: This is a truly great app, probably the best for its category in the store. It could be awesome if some simple thing like the ability to wifi print graphs and results could be awesome

title: Good app, but
body: Unable to add my Freestyle Lite meter even though it's listed. I especially like the graph feature. Tried to get the carb count info but couldn't get the info for some reason.

title: Good start
body: This is a good basic app.  I would like to sort graph by time of day category.  It would also be nice to touch a point on the graph and drill down to the log for more detailed info.

title: Better than most
body: I like the integration with other apps.  Able to zero in on key components of BG control easily.

title: Very helpful!
body: GB has been very helpful in managing my type 2 diabetes. I love that I can print logs for my doctor, and keep track of number trends!

title: Only diabetes app I use
body: Great for showing trends and keeping my stat records.  The web site and the ability to send PDF to dr. helps in deciding future treatments

title: I love this App
body: This app has been the best thing for me in keeping track of my GB.  My doctor loves the app and has recommended it to other patients.  I live by this app.

title: Gestational diabetes
body: This app has been so useful and easy during my pregnancy.  I used it everyday and now every other day. Excellent!!!

title: ERH
body: Very easy to use for daily logging. I especially find the graphing feature helpful for tracking my sugars visually.

title: It's the little things
body: Overall, I like the app and it's synchronization with the web site. Here are the Pros and Cons:

title: Easy and fast blood glucose logging
body: Quick logging with time stamps and pre filled notes.

title: Cannot sync
body: I have been using this app for almost three years and have loved it. Now, for the last two weeks I cannot sync my logs. It cannot establish a connection to the server. Is anybody looking into this?!?  You must be busy fixing it, because no one replies to repeated emails about the problem.

title: Jujo5964
body: This is a wonderful application to keep track with my glucose readings. It's easy to use and view results.

title: Easy to use
body: No complaints so far! Easy to track my glucose levels for my doc.

title: Great
body: I have used this app daily for almost a year now. Pretty basic and maybe even a little boring, but very helpful in my life and very easy to use!!

title: Some improvements needed
body: Being able to upload data to the Apple health app and directly to our Drs office would be nice .

title: Excellent
body: Very quick and easy to use. I am finding more functions as I continue to use it.

title: Does it all
body: Just what I wanted and solid, dependable app. Haven't used all the features but nice to know they will be there when needed.

title: Helps me keep track
body: Easy to use and fast. I can check my BG anywhere.  There is no need to carry a log with me.

title: New user
body: Very useful. Quick & easy to use, which is important for something to be used several times per day.

title: Good
body: Awesome tool for keeping track of BG. Easy to print charts/graphs/logs from web site. Not good that you need to purchase some components that they consider extra such as food intake. Otherwise, I like it a lot.

title: Very easy to track blood glucose readings
body: It's been easy to get used to using the app. I wish the food was just as easy to find and log. Tracking my Meds has been fairly easy as well.

title: Awesome app !!!
body: I've had this app for a couple weeks and love it. It's easy to track my blood glucose level, track my progress and estimate my A1C.

title: Flexible
body: I appreciate getting to see all of my information in one view.  This is a very fine app!

title: Easy
body: It is easy to use for the most part although the features could be more stream line.

title: Carol
body: I have been using this tool for about 6 months and I appreciate it. I use the notes section to enter blood pressure readings and that could be helpful I'm an upgrade.

title: Great!
body: Makes tracking easy and nice to visually see any trends. Also nice to see past meals carbs for repeat meals/snacks. Can't beat the price. Thank you for this wonderful app!

title: I love my Glucose Buddy
body: I use to have a hard time remembering to write down my medications, my BG readings and what I ate... This app males it so much easier to maintain accurate readings and share with my Dr

title: Easy and helpful
body: Great app. Helps me to keep on top of my glucose levels and my doctor loves the ease of looking at my iPhone for detailed info

title: Great app for the diabetic
body: It records so many things and keeps logs. I wish it would graph by time type, such as "before dinner" so you could see trends and averages grouped. Also a PDF export would be cool.

title: Easy to Use
body: App is easy to use and you don't need to use a lot is features, just a log works.

title: Easy to track
body: Simple to use and nice graph feature to share with your doc. No confusion

title: Good App
body: Very useful for diabetic measures. It is good to help track the records. It will be further good to enable taking other inputs with the glucose rate. Also having possibility to add only comments. I recommend strongly the acquisition of this App.

title: Easiest way to keep track

title: Great app!
body: I'm really enjoying this app and how easy it is to use. I like that I can email or print the log for my doctor. Is there a way to print the graphs? That would be awesome.

title: Mrs
body: This has been great for a newly diagnosed diabetic. I was able to show my doctor a graph that showed I was on track. I would have liked the weight tracking to be included

title: Very helpful!
body: GB truly helps me track my levels, and since knowledge is power, it gives the power I need to combat this disease.

title: Great for those recently diagnosed

title: Love this app
body: Easy to use. Keeps track of glucose, meds, foods and more. Makes things easier to discuss with my Doctor.

title: Free and easy to use
body: This product is free and easy to use. I like it better than my droid app for my smart phone.

title: Wonderful
body: So far I love the app. The only thing I haven't been able to figure out is connecting to the food app. That doesn't seem to be working yet.

title: Superb
body: What a fantastic application - it makes you remember to test just by its existence - wish I had this one years ago.  Thanks ! ! !

title: Bad service
body: I purchased the Pro edition a year ago. Backed everything up.  Used online and everything. My phone died and I had to get a new one. Now they are requiring I pay again to use the features I paid for in the past. The updates apparently don't work on new phones.

title: I second HappiHappi's comments.

title: Great
body: I bought the premium to keep track of my Blood Pressure. I have had a stroke at 40 and now I'm 47 and don't want another one.

title: Clear, simple, terrific

body: Communicating with doctor and getting fast feedback is made easy with GB. It is great to track progress through charts as well.

title: Glucose buddy
body: Great system, I actually enjoy keeping track.  Can't wait to print it out and take it to my doctor.

title: Easy to track my numbers!

title: Works well

title: Glucose Buddy
body: This whole diabetes thing is new to me I am forgetting to do my meds a lot and forgetting to document my Bloodsugars this app helps me greatly in reducing my forgetfulness !

title: Great app
body: Easy to use. Can also track meds and food. Great to email results to dr and can jot notes too.

title: User

title: Great Product

title: Really helps!

title: Helpful

title: Back on Track =)
body: I just wanted to say a big THANK YOU for creating this app. It's been wonderful and such a help. I was diagnosed Type 2 in 2006. I started doing everything as I was supposed to, logging my food, logging my activity, logging my meds... after about 6 months into it my life got a little more hectic and i kept forgetting my notepad. At the time I logged everything by pen & paper. Eventually I started forgetting my notebook, eating on the go, forgetting my meds, etc... Well 2 months ago my old Treo started dying a slow death. I started phone shopping and my husband & my sister were both iPhone 3G owners so they kept pushing the iPhone. I was so against the iPhone just because it was so mainstream and everyone around me had one. One day as I'm watching the 2 of them talking about apps & seeing the commercial saying they got an app for everything, I started to wonder... I already had an iTunes account so I went looking for a diabetes management app. Sure enough I found Glucose Buddy, and much higher rated than even paid apps!! I went out and bought an iPhone3GS that day and Glucose Buddy was the first app I installed =)

title: Best available
body: I'm a type 2 diabetic with large gl fluctuations. I tried all the free/lite iPhone monitoring tools and have found this one to be the best for the one most important reason to me ease of use. It has a no help needed user interface. Entering the basics 3 to 5 times a day has to take minimal effort or I won't use it. You can easily email the log to your doctor. You can also take a snapshot of the gl graph which is a good companion to the log so your doctor can zoom in on food and activites or lack thereof on the dates in your log that had the most fluctuations or highest gl. Your log can be synchronized with the server so you get the sense it won't get lost if something happened to your phone. I don't have any experience with recovering after a lost phone but the sync always goes smoothly for me. It's certainly fast with a wifi connection which I have at home.

title: Good app, no support
body: I'll start by saying that GB has a lot of great functionality for anyone who needs to monitor blood glucose. You can enter sugar measurements, meds, activities, and food from any of your iDevices and the combined logs will be synced to the GB website. The app has a useful "how am I doing" graph and you can view your logs online or export them.  If you give your web login information to your health care team they will be able to track your progress in near real time.
